Astrid's apartment is exquisitely decorated - a gem in the trendy Woodstock neighbourhood with views of both the mountain and the sea. An oasis of gorgeous plants Astrid was a really accommodating host and we had a wonderful stay.

Astrid's apartment is lovely. It is spacious and filled with light and all those little details just make you feel at home. Communication with Astrid was super easy. The neighbourhood is great  close to the city centre and the beaches as well as close to bars  restaurants etc.

The apartment is beautifully furnished and Astrid is charming and helpful. Woodstock is filled with interesting shops and restaurants and is only a short cab ride from the attractions of Observatory. If you're looking for a more bohemian quarter of town then Astrid's place is a perfect base. Just bear in mind that Central Cape Town this ain't which is why we liked it.
Astrid hat eine wunderschne Wohnung. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefhlt und werden defintiv wiederkommen.

This apartment is well located in the trendy neighbourhood of Woodstock allowing to explore the surrounding arty  creative shops by foot. The balcony offers a great view over the city and harbour. Street parking works well. Astrid was very helpful and shared some great insider tips with us. Very recommendable.
Beautiful apartment with loads of plant life my brother and I felt like we were in the jungle. Pity we only stayed one night  Astrid was wonderful and very helpful.

The apartment was beautifully furnished  very comfortable and the location was very convenient  walking distance from cafes  restaurants and bars in Woodstock  a vibrant neighborhood in Cape Town. The communication with Astrid was excellent  everything went smoothly. Highly recommended.

Astrid was very welcoming and a great communicator - very clear directions and a very accurate description of the flat. The apartment is beautiful - a home away from home. Her decor is exceptional - full of inspiring art pieces and a very impressive array of pot plants The area was perfect for our needs - very central and convenient you don't need to worry about getting stuck in crazy rush hour traffic. We discovered a great deli down the road called Salisbury's who are open every day and have wonderful lunches and salads. All in all it was a perfect work  holiday getaway.

We had a wonderful stay in Astrid's lovely apartment It is a very charming and beautifully decorated place with lot's of attention for details and a lovely sunny terrace for breakfast  situated in the inspiring design neighbourhood of Woodstock. Astrid was the perfect host for us  she welcomed us with flowers and a delicious bottle of wine. We really hope to come back one day
Nice host nice place no complaints and listing is accurate
Nice and comfortable stay. Close to the Old Biscuit Mill. In the apartement everything is there. Thanks for a Great Start in South Afrika.
Die Wohnung ist sehr sauber und freundlich eingerichtet. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefhlt. Vielen Dank Astrid fr die tollen Tage in Woodstock.

Such a lovely apartment in a great location. Astrid was ever so helpful. I highly recommend the myciti local bus as the conversations en-route give you a taste of the real Cape Town. All listings and photographs are accurate and I would happily stay again. We all felt right at home. Thank you Astrid.

The accomodation was like in the description and very nice  clean and comfortable. Astrid is a very friendly and nice person and she explained us everything quite well and even let us some fruits and biscuits on the table. I really can recommend that place.

We had a lovely 2-days stay in Astrid's very comfortable  charming and homely flat. It was beautifully clean and we found everything that we needed. Astrid met us on our arrival  made us very welcome and explained a few things about the locality. Woodstock is a good place to begin exploring Cape Town. We thoroughly recommend the flat as a place to stay.
Lovely apartment in good position.  Just as pictured and great to have the daily clean
Beautiful apartment in a great location. Chantal is a wonderful host and the apartment is spotless.

Fabulous location  probably the best interior decor and furniture we've seen in many Cape Town stays  and optional daily cleaninglaundry make this a perfect flat for a low-stress and easy work or fun trip. Fast internet and DSTV as well.
Extremely clean  modern apartment which is close to many Sea Point eateries. Excellent coffee shop just a street up called Bootlegger. Chantal was a great host. Will definitely book again.
Same as before

The condo and its location was superb  We stayed for almost three months and enjoyed ourselves immensely.  We could walk to three different supermarkets and a dozen wonderful restaurants.  Our favorite walk each morning was along the promenade in either direction for miles along the ocean.  The views of the ocean  boulders  Table Mountain and Lions Peak were incredible  The host was more than accommodating to our every need.  Housekeeping every week was a real plus.  Cape Town is amazing and we were more than happy at this wonderful condo.
Brilliant

Chantals place is a tranquil Sea Point home in a perfect position. The wonderful trees to west of the apartment  block the late afternoon sun so the balcony is perfect for soaking up the ocean views. Easy access to local shops  restaurants and the Camps Bay to VA Waterfront promenade make this an enjoyable home.

Chantals place was a great place to stay while visiting Cape Town.  Its close to lots of excellent bars  cafes and restaurants in Sea Point.  It is about a one hour walk along the seafront into the heart of Cape Town.

Dit was een absoluut top appartement. In de details zie je dat alles goed is afgewerkt. Prachtig smaakvol ingericht  fantastisch uitzicht  ideale locatie  150 meter van Regentstreet waar de supermarkten  restaurants en winkeltjes te vinden zijn. Contact met Chantal was efficint en hartelijk. Soms een beetje lawaaierig in het weekend maar met de ramen dicht  geen probleem. Een absolute  aanrader
Beautiful and very safe Apt in prime location. Comminication with Chantal is very easy and quick.We had a wonderful time and would love to come back.
Great place to stay -close to beaches  shops. Chantal is top of her game.
We had a very good stay in the appartment. Would stay again and definitely recommend
Just perfect in every way -
super nice and welcoming person well-decorated and located apt just walking distance to art galleries  old biscuit mill  cool restos and shops  super cool
Tout tait parfait. Le logement est bien situe afin de pouvoir faire toutes les activits
Great apartment  well located with everything one needs for a comfortable stay. We would highly recommend this apartment.

Astrid was a great host from start to finish. She picked up my friend and I from the train station and gave us a little tour of the neighborhood and apartment. She was super responsive anytime we had a question. The apartment was lovely and well-appointed for a month's stay. I would definitely recommend it to anyone going to Cape Town

Astrid's home was wonderful and looked exactly like the pictures. Cozy and beautifully decorated  this space in woodstok was near cute cafes and restaurants and a short drive from fun shopping. Would highly recommend

Astrid was very accommodating and kind when I booked for my elderly mother. She and her 75-year-old travel companion were very pleased with the cleanliness  space and convenience of Astrid's place. Thanks for your help Astrid.

Excellent communication from Astrid right through our stay. We had an unexpected late arrival and she went out of her way to assist us The apartment turned out to be exactly as depicted in the photos and was spotlessly clean on arrival. Beautiful views as well as extremely well located. I will definitely stay here again. Thanks for all the trouble you went to for us Astrid  we really appreciate it
Tolle Unterkunft in Woodstock. Wir haben die Zeit und den tollen Ausblick sehr genossen.

Astrid is a 5 star host and her place is everything you could wish for. Conveniently situated between the city centre and the vibrant southern suburbs Constantia is also a short drive from there. The interior is stylish and you will enjoy a fantastic harbour view. I can highly recommend Astrids place is my go to place in Cape Town
The most beautiful and unique apartment with very creative touches Helpful and flexible host. Perfect space for friends or a family vacationing together.
Really nice apartment Fantastic views from the balkony Easy and smooth communication
Lovely unit
Eine freundliche  zugewandte Gastgeberin  die die Unterkunft kreativ und sthetisch gestaltet hat -- eine in jeder Hinsicht schne Erfahrung.
we enjoyed our stay in Astrid's home  just a couple of items we could of used and a few maintenance issues but a very nice stay.
It was okay

The apartment was absolutely stunning and Brad was a very generous host. The apartment is centrally located on Long Street which is less than a 10 minute walk to Bo-Kaap and 20 minute walk to V  A Waterfront.  The apartment was perfect size for the 4 of us  All Adults and had top of the line appliances and modern furniture. Brad was also nice enough to stalk the pantry with basic cooking supplies and cold Beer. I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone staying in Cape Town. Thanks for taking so good care of us BRAD.

This is a great place for two people in a perfect location. Beautiful view We slept with the windows wide open every night There is as secured  gated parking spot  housekeeping comes each day  mini bar if you would like to purchase any items  and a safe in the closet should you want to store any valuables while you're away. Walking distance to the waterfront and to the hopon hopoff bus stop down by the lighthouse which is the best way to get around the city and explore.  The only two things I would mention for travelers. . . 1. There is a fee to have wifi. It's fairly inexpensive but still important to note. And 2. You need to pick the keys up a few minutes away from the actual apartment which is easy if you have a car but could be a nuisance if you're in a cab our other form of transportation and hauling luggage around. The people we met with to pick up keys were extremely pleasant and Chantal is very responsive and helpful when you have questions  Beautiful place to stay in a beautiful town
The flat is perfectly located. The only airbnb that I know that comes with daily cleaning service. Truly enjoyed our stay there.
Fantastic stay with beautiful views and very convenient location. Would definitely recommend
Wonderful stay in the best position. Beautiful view of the ocean

We had a great stay at Brad and Cheryl's place in Long Street. The apartment is well stocked  and is very comfortable. It is exactly as described and more central location  beautiful and safe. Brad and Cheryl are excellent hosts. They respond quickly  answering all questions and anticipation any questions we may have regarding our stay. We appreciated very much when Brad picked us up at the train station when we arrived after work hours. They also opened a bubbly for us to welcome us to their place. We highly recommend staying with them if you want a great and enjoyable stay at Cape Town

The hosts made us feel very welcome.  The internet didn't work when we arrived and it was fixed within an hour.  Host were very accommodating and responsive.  I would definitely stay at the flat again.

The apartment was clean and spacious  Cheryl welcomed me and was most helpful. Everything was great and the 2 nights stay was pleasant. The internet WIFI worked well which helped me as I needed to email clients.

Brad we appreciate being a great host and the place itself was awesome. Brad met us on arrival  and showed us around the apartment even enjoyed a glass of champagne with us that he had gifted before leaving. The place was in a great location  right near restaurants and bars on Long Street. It was also central to other activities. Two nice rooms  also with a washer and dryer The place was clean and spacious. Couldn't have asked for a better place. Thanks brad Until next time
Brad's flat is ideal for a stay in Cape Town. The location is excellent as it is close to everything including good restaurants  sightseeing buses  shops etc.

The apartment was located on Long street  literally a 30 second walk from the Hop On Hop Off tour bus stop and next to an awesome Ethiopian restaurant and coffee shop.  The neighborhood was a little on the sketchy side but there are so many awesome places close by that I would totally stay there again if I ever go back to Cape Town. We were met by Brad's wife who was super nice and helpful. She even sent the bag of souvenirs that we left at their place to our next location in SA. We are super grateful for that.

Ive been to Cape Town 4 times now and Brads place is the best AirBnB for location  size  walkability  everything. Youre in the heart of the city  with parking included  and an awesome view of Lions Head Would definitely stay here again
Super design et agencement. Super lieux. Trs bon sjour.

Amazing location  everything you need is just a short walk or uber. The place was very clean and had everything we needed. Very quick to answer any questions or concerns I had. My friends and I had a great time
True value for money
Great place great views would come back again perfect location

What a great place to stay The location was exactly what I was looking for quiet  but still close to everything  good view of the sea and immaculately clean. The complementary toiletries  hair dryer and beach towels were a really nice touch. Chantal was also very patienthelpful with all of my questions. This was my first stay in Cape Town and Im hoping it wont be the last. I would highly recommend staying here.

Chantals place is well located  we could literally walk to the VA Waterfront. We honestly did not need a car for this trip. I especially enjoyed the morning jogs along the Promenade  it was beautiful. The view in the morning was well worth waking up to. Thanks Chantal.
Highly recommended. Great location and the unit is perfect - Has everything you need  at a very high standard and Chantal is an excellent host.
Booked Chantals place for clients on a business trip. They had a wonderful time  and were super happy with the space and the location
Great view  great location. Fantastic stay.
Chantals is a great apartment  that is ideally situated
It was such a lovely place to stay Nothing to complain about
Such a great place right along the promenade. Easy walk or quick ride to restaurants and VA waterfront as well. Simple  classy place that was an excellent place to stay while in Cape Town.
Stylish apartment next to the ocean
The view is the best. Saw whales and dolphins everyday. Best location. Will definitely be back
The spot is well positioned along the coast and offers a good docking point for both business and leisure travellers
Really enjoyed the stay. Amazing apartment and Chantal was helpful throughout the stay.
Stayed for a month.  Great location  and not just for the sunrises and sunsets.  Fast internet  even through loadshedding.  All amenities needed.  Stunning walks along the promenade daily. Thank you
Great stay in a superb apartment

I had a wonderful experience. Always helpful.  One thing to change would be the noise that the floor makes  but other than that everything was perfect. We'll be back for sure. Woke up with this beautiful view. Thanks for all.
Great host and very nice apartment in the beautiful neighborhood in Cape Town. Fantastic view Chantal is always responsive. Enjoy the stay
Great stay  good communication throughout. Would highly recommend
Beautiful view and well managed apartment block

Ich war knappe 2 5 Wochen und war mehr als zufrieden  von der Buchung bis zur Abreise alles wunderbar in Ordnung  eine hervorragende Kommunikation mit uerst freundlichem Kontakt  immer fr Fragen offen gewesen und schnelle Rckmeldung erhalten  das Airbnb ist toll gelegen  sehr sauber  hat alles was es braucht  habe mich sehr zuhause gefhlt und komme auf jedenfall wieder Nur zu empfehlen Herzlichsten Dank
An excellent place to stay that's right on the oceanfront and which we plan to use again next year.
The location is incredible and the unit is exactly what I needed for a working visit in CT

Brad's spot is the perfect Cape Town location centrally located on Long Street. We were able to quickly get to destinations like Table Mountain and the VA Waterfront. Brad and his wife Cheryl were very friendly and responsive to messages and Cheryl gave us some amazing suggestions for dinner Mojo Market. The apartment itself is very clean and feels safe because of the security in the lobby. It's on Long Street  so you're close to great restaurants and bars  but far enough away that it's never too noisy. We loved it and will definitely be back
The appartment is located close to the center of town. Better not walk alone at night. Good value for money.
A good place to be
Very comfortable  easily accessible

Exactly as advertised and easy checkin. Brad was available to answer any question quickly. The linens were really nice and the beds were comfortable. The apartment staff were welcoming and friendly. We would happily stay here again.
Good space for some time out in the city. Clean and very modern space. Enjoyed our stay here.

THE PLACE a two-bedroom well-appointed apartment. very comfortable beds in both bedrooms. There's a view of Lion's Head from the balcony. Netflix Smart TV  but the normally available internet wasn't working I was the first person to use the place in months due to the lockdown and had booked last-minute. There was a very deep bathtub with separate shower. I had wanted several long soaks since this is a stressful time  so I had especially asked about the tub before I got there. There is a family-size refrigerator in the kitchen  as well as a dishwasher. There are airconheating units. LOCATION Long Street  in Cape Town CBD. Normally bustling most of the time  but in this era of COVID  eerily quiet. THE HOST Brad seemed nice  and got everything set up on a moment's notice  which was great. ADDITIONAL TIPS if you smoke outside  move the table away from the fans for the airconheating or the smoke will fill up the place. Book this place when the city is up and running again  or even if you want a quiet getaway the way things are now.
Amazing

The spot was very nice and the building felt secure. They even replaced our linens once per week and included a mid-stay clean of the apartment. They were responsive throughout the stay as hosts. Would highly recommend

Booking with Brad was a breeze His friendly and warm communication made us feel at ease from the beginning. We arrived for a late check in so we were unfortunately unable to directly meet Brad  still he gave us very clear directions on how to get started. We were greeted by the very nice and helpful security of the building. The flat itself is spotless and modern it is big and more than equipped with anything our family of four needed. The location is perfect  it's safe and it's walking distance from restaurants and a super souvenir Market. We would definitely retun back to Brad's flat if we have the chance to visit Cape Town in the future. Thank you Brad for your kindness and hospitality.
We had a great stay
Great location  enough space for 4 adults  parking was available.
Brads place was lovely and comfy. Beautiful view if the review is for 1207. The other unit were the other family was it did not have a great view.
Very central. Convenient as we were at the ICC for the whole week.
I stayed here when I was in town for a conference. It was a great apartment in a good location. Nicely decorated with all mod-cons. Not a bad thing to say about the place.
Thanks for the wonderful stay
It was just beautiful Wonderful location and Chantal very accessible.
Another wonderful stay here in this gem
A great spot
Perfect for sightseers wanting a comfortable place to sleep. Bathroom is great. Garage available for those with cars.

This place is such a bijoux. I loved staying there. The location is great and the apartment just wonderful. I had a great week and everything was much better than expected. I will come back for sure Thank you again Chantal
Lovely stay. Clean  safe and very well located. Chantals quick responses to questions were really appreciated.

Lovely studio spot  in great a location   with fantastic finishes and it  could just be the cleanest place in Cape Town. Feels like a quiet Oceanside getaway  but is right near the sea point bustle  a quick ride to the city bowl  and an easy walk to the waterfront. We loved staying in the flat as it was super comfy and had everything we needed  not least of all amazing seafront views. Kinda place thats hard to leave Thanks for a great stay

This is an excellent apartment. The views are unbeatable. My wife and I found the location to be very safe. Check-in process was very easy and straightforward. The apartment has great stylish touches. The wooden floor by the window was very unique and appreciated. We used the Nespresso machine for coffee every day and sat at the kitchen island. The kitchen was stocked with all the cookware  dishes and cutlery that you could need. The bathroom was great. I cannot say enough great things about this space. I'm very happy we stayed here and would definitely stay here again. Daily housekeeping really sets this place apart. The only drawback was the lack of air conditioning which may be a problem for some. My wife found the apartment to be too warm on some nights  but I found it to be comfortable. There is a ceiling fan above the bed that I found to be more than adequate to keep cool at night.
great view and neat room
Chantal's place exceeded my expectations it is spotless and the sea views are incredible  will definitely recommend it as it is so close to everything one might need.
Excellent. Right on the sea and close to two great restaurants
A fantastic stay  the apartment was great and really spacious and above all it had a great view. I will definitely  be staying here again
Lovey place. My folks had a great time here and would love to stay here again in future
Great apartment. Great location. Chantal is a very responsive and very professional host.
This place was in an amazing location- close to everything and the view was amazing.  Everything was clean and just so nicely arranged and decorated.  I would definitely choose this place again.
Chantal was quick to respond to queries and accomodate requests. Very nice apartment with thoughtful touches.

place was great  It has amazing ocean views and perfect location  There was also a cleaning service that would come in and clean things up and leave fresh towels  this was a special touch  Thanks for having me  I look forward to staying again

The host was very flexible and the view was amazing. I would definitely stay here again if I go back to Cape Town. Just keep in mind that theres no AC  which isnt really needed because the waterfront is cool  but also keep in mind that there are mosquitoes so you cannot keep the windows open at night. The room was very clean and someone came by everyday to clean the place. The decor is very modern and chic. I loved that they provide nespresso and all the kitchen supplies needed to cook or cut fruits  etc. Location was amazing Thanks again for everything Chantal
Place was perfect. Just as the pictures. Check-in and out was easy. The housekeeping daily is definitely an additional benefit. Would stay there again.
A great place to stay in Cape Town
Nice place to stay. Good location  very safe  beautiful beach.
Really nice accommodation in a perfect location. I would recommend the property.
Perfect location Super easy check in process and a very comfortable stay.

Great place to base out of when visiting Cape Town Great access to the beaches  Waterfront  and everything else. Parking space makes it really accessible and the host was accessible for all questions and needs  definitely recommend this place

The apartment was excellent. It is in great location with an amazing sea view. The apartment had everything we needed and was cleaned on a daily basis too. I would highly recommend staying here because of the location  quality and size of the apartment and price. Also the neighbourhood is safe.

Chantal provided everything I needed and kept the apartment clean via weekly housekeeping services. She recommended local laundry services as well as other local necessities. Very easy to reach at all times. Great apartment in a great location  right on the water Truly the best spot in Cape Town

Lovely apartment  nicely furnisheddecorated beautiful sea views  safe area  close to restaurants and the VA Waterfront. Chantal was very responsive and helpful. Easy access underground secure parking. Would definitely stay again. Some of these reviews mention daily housekeeping. That wasn't the case for me but it wasn't an issue.

Isa was a great host throughout the process. She went above and beyond to make us comfortable and helped us with unforeseen issues as they arose. The flat was beautiful  clean  and spacious and had an excellent location close to the beach  restaurants  grocery stores  and buses to the city center. Definitely recommended
Otto was a pleasure to chat to. The room was amazing and the area is really great.
We never met Otto but as we are old Capetonians it did not really matter   as we didn't need any help with getting around town

Ett mycket praktiskt och bra boende i ett lugnt och trevligt omrde. Nra in till Kapstaden och gngavstnd till stora kpcentrum med flera restauranger. Mycket bra wi-fi och bra utrustning. Vrden r mycket ltt att n och ger hg service. Vi kan verkligen rekommendera detta boende.
Correspondence was fantastic. Very conveniently located. Stay was very comfortable. Home away from home with all the amenities you can think of - electric blankets  air-conditioning etc. Thank you

Otto's place was absolutely lovely.  Extremely well located and not that far from Cape Town center.  Absolute value for money and I'm really glad I chose Otto's place. Loved the BraiBBQ feature in this property and the little living area. Fully equipped kitchen.  Everything was clean and we had everything we needed to cook.  AC was a plys  though we didn't really need it.  Otto was so pleasant  Lovely lovely and value for money.  I highly recommend and I will be back again when in South Africa next time.  Thanks Otto
Great location and spacious accomodation.
We had a wonderful stay at Isas apartment. Great location  beautiful apt  and wonderful host

This flat is a beautiful period place  with old wooden floors and the original glass in the doors. It makes you feel at home right away. It is spacious and very comfortable. Isa had left lots of welcoming things and provided great information about the flat and the location which is also excellent. The flat is in great condition and was absolutely spotless when we arrived. I will definitely return here

Isa was very easy to speak to and hospitable. I mentioned I'd watch movies off my laptop and she made sure there was an HDMI cable for me to connect to the TV. The apartment is a large  has the various required amenities and is a comfortable place to stay. It's a few minutes walk from the promenade and various restaurantscoffee shops. Sea Point is one of my favourite places in Cape Town  so I enjoyed every moment of my stay.

Isa was a really great hostess  she received us very well given us all informations about the city and the neighborhood. We loved staying at Isas apartment  it was so confortable to us and the place is fantastic. We highly recommend.
Perfect location and a beautiful flat Highly recommend
Lovely stylish flat in great location. All aspects of stay were perfect and Isa is a pleasant  generous  and relaxed host. We never felt we were imposing.

Isa has a very stylish apartment  which is at the same time quiet and very well located  close to markets  restaurants and the pavilion swimming pool. Although she was not in the city during our stay  we were very well received by her friend Mike  who was available during the whole time. Highly recommend it
We had a great stay at Isa's airbnb  amazing location  decoration on point and very friendly and helpful host Highly recommended Merci Isa
My sister Marlise and Partner had a lovely stay at Otto's Place. Helpfull and friendly host. Will always recommend this place
Place is just fantastic Really enjoyed my stay at Otto's
Cozy flat with an indoor braai. Luxurious finishes and amenities. Great value for money

Our stay was wonderful. Isas place is situated perfectly in beautiful Seapoint  super close to shops  restaurants and the amazing Seapoint promenade.  The WiFi is excellent. The apartment is specious and has everything you could need and Isa was a great host. She was helpful and caring when our toddler got sick. We will definitely visit again

We really liked the apartment with retro and comfortable decoration.  Isa is a very friendly and kind host about introducing us to the walking neighborhood.  The location of the apartment is very good near waterfront  Mojo Market and amenities.  We highly recommend this rental.

My mom and my sister stayed at Isa's apartment when visiting me in Cape Town. It is such a beautiful  inspiring space with stylish  tasteful touches throughout. Isa is great with communication  the whole stay was a breeze. Perfect location for visitors to Cape Town. Everything has been thought of. Thanks  Isa
Gorgeous apartment  so comfortable and love the art
Great location We had a lovely stay

Loved staying here. Beautiful neat old fashioned apartment home with wooden floors that renders a classic feel. Location is perfect. Walking distance from restaurants and coffee shops and the beach. Instruction booklet very precise and gives you all the info you need. Nice neighbourhood. Did not once feel unsafe  even when being out at night. Wi-fi good quality. Security gate and electric fencing is always a bonus. Pet friendly and although on the first floor of the building  it is easy to take a pet out for walks etc. Friendly neighbours. Truly a home away from home.

Don't look further this is the nicest place to stay in Sea Point. Beautiful  quiet  well equipped with everything you need and close to the beach and restaurants. Communication with Isa was also fast and efficient.

Let me start by saying that Isa was a fantastic host . Communicating with her was so easy and she was available when needed . Check in was easy and Isa was super helpful to let us check in early which we were great-full for . This apartment is a lovely little gem   full of character. The apartment and all linen were very clean . Its was a short walk from the promenade and very central to all the shops and restaurants. I would definitely recommend this place .

Isa had the rental well prepared for load shedding. In addition the rental is comfortable even in the winter months because of the preparations made. The location is comfortable and very convenient being close to shopping and restaurants which reduces the need for getting into the car to get to the shops.
Thank you for the stay  a home away from home
A comfortable unit close to malls and markets. Isa was a great host and the unit was comfortable and have more than what is needed for a week stay. can highly recommend.

Thank you so much The little thoughtful touches that were left by Isa made the place feel like home. Isa was very responsive and very accommodating. The location was great and within walking distance to everywhere. We felt safe and secure. The beds and room size was great and the place was well equipped and clean. Thank you for hosting our stay. I recommend this flat and host to everyone  especially if you want a memorable stay and if you want to be in a fabulous location.

We had the best time exploring Cape Town from Isa's place - it was a wonderful home from home  with fantastic views of Lion's Head from the balcony and so well situated to explore the city. Sea point is a fantastic neighbourhood  we felt totally safe walking around and there are so many amazing restaurants  cafes  boutique shops and beaches in walking distance. Isa was incredibly helpful and friendly - going above and beyond be giving us a guided tour of the area and so many useful and unique tips for our trip. Her flat is a wonderful space - light  cool and filled with beautiful artwork and funky furniture - we really enjoyed staying here and getting to know her
Great stay
I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here. Otto is a wonderful  friendly and very accomodating host. I will definitely be back to stay
Isa was a lovely host Only met her once on arrival but she kept in touch to see how we were doing.Her apartment is a credit to her and is even nicer than the photos .It was a hard place to leave.
Absolutely wonderful art deco apartment on a quiet street in Sea PointFresnaye  with plenty of restaurants and amenities in the vicinity. Isa is lovely host and made us feel very welcome.

Our stay in this Art Deco apartment in Cape Town was fantastic. The apartment's design was impeccable  and our host Isa was exceptional  making us feel at home. The location was convenient for exploring the city. Highly recommended
Wonderful host and location but the tasteful interior was my favourite

Isa is a great host  friendly and informative. We really enjoyed the location and walked around the neighborhood daily. The apartment was much larger than expected and plenty of room for us and our 2 younger children.

Stayed here for 2 days  and had a wonderful time. Isa was a fantastic host  and was super friendly and responsive. The apartment was gorgeous  and was in the middle of a lovely neighbourhood. Would definitely recommend.
We had a wonderful stay. Great location- easy and quick access to everything you will need. Isa  the host  was very welcoming. I would stay here again.

Isas place is a gem Her apartment is filled with personality  has an amazing lions head view from the kitchen window where we loved to work in the mornings  and its only one block away from the seapoint promenade and its vibrant scene. Also  Isa herself is very very helpful  proactive and understanding. Absolutely recommended
Isa has been super flexible and really helpful with us. The apartment is perfectly located  really calm and comfortable. Thanks again Isa

We had a wonderful stay at Isa's. A few days ahead of time she put us in touch with a reliable driver who picked us up from the airport. Then she was there to greet us when we arrived at the apartment  walked us through everything  and had great recommendations. Her place was super clean and well-organized  close to the waterrestaurantsgrocersnightlife  etc  and very quiet  secure. We felt right at home. Next time we plan a trip to Cape Town we will definitely reach out to Isa. Can't recommend highly enough

Isa is a warm and hospitable host. She welcomed us personally and went above and beyond to make sure we had all the comforts of her home. The house is incredibly beautiful  with exquisite art and lovely cockery It is very conveniently located within easy walking distance to the beach  outdoor swimming pools  beautiful kitchenware stores like Blink  amazing supermarkets and restaurants. Try Kleinsky's for the most delicious hot filled bagels  Kanela coffee for brunch and outdoor seating  and Kimchi for Korean barbecue. Isa went out of her way during our trip to make sure we had everything we needed. I would definitely recommend staying here and wish we could have stayed for longer.
Perfectly described on the advert.  Really super host.  Will most definitely recommend to friends and will most certainly stay here again.
Wir haben uns in der Wohnung wie zu Hause gefhlt Sehr gemtlich und privat  besondere Kunst an den Wnden zu bestaunen und mittendrin. Es war fr uns einfach perfekt. Auch mit Kind sehr gut

In der Unterkunft war alles da  was wir brauchten. Isa war sehr hilfsbereit  hat uns sogar die unmittelbare Umgebung gezeigt und war flexibel beim aus- und einchecken. Sie vermittelte uns auch einen Fahrer  der uns vom Flughafen abholte. In der Umgebung gibt es alles  was man braucht - Geschfte  Restaurants und es ist nicht weit vom Wasser und der Promenade entfernt. Mit Uber ist man schnell an Sightseeing-Points in Kapstadt. Wir hatten einen tollen Urlaub

Isa was an amazingly warm and friendly host who even gave us a quick walking tour of the local neighborhood The apartment itself is very nice and homely  and is walking distance to lots of great bars  cafes and restaurants. I would definetley stay here again. Thanks so much Isa
Great stay

My stay at Mareli's place was absolute bliss...... exceeded all my expectations and more......with a spectacular view from balcony of Table mountain  Lions head and the city of Cape Town.....was a fantastic experience and value for money and Mareli was a wonderful host

We thoroughly enjoyed staying at Otto's place. It was clean  cosy and the location was perfect. I would definitely recommend to others as well as to stay here again. Otto was also very attentive and quick with his responses.
Great place and awesome host

If I stay anywhere in Cape Town  it will be here. The apartment has everything you need and is comfortable and clean. The area is quiet and the park next door is a welcoming tranquil break too. Would highly recommend staying here.

Beautiful apartment in perfect location of Cape Town with 180 degree view of the ocean. Very clean  modern with a well-stocked kitchen. Situated in a very quiet area. Host is extremely friendly and helpful. Keep in mind that quiet time at 10 pm is strictly enforced. When we visit Cape Town again we will definitely stay in the same apartment.
Beautiful view and easy access to safe parking. Not too personal atmosphere in the place but clean  cozy  functional and well located. I would stay there again

We spent an outstanding time in your apartment. Large and friendly  perfectly outfitted  great views  secure parking. Close to the city  close to the cape region. All is very well organized. You feel as comfortable as at home. We will definitively come back

Like the year before  our stay in Peters apartment was marvellous. All is well organized and serviced. The location is perfect for  visits to the City  to the Peninsula or for just staying lazy on the balcony  watching the Atlantic Ocean.
Great view and location Simple and all you need for a holiday in a beautiful city.
Perfection to the last detail. An outstanding apartment  well equipped and maintained and easy responsive communication. Highly recommended. Enjoy your stay jean
We know what we get  that's why we come back again and again. And Peter is a very generous super-super host

Peter is a great host and the apartment is all you need. We stayed here for a couple of weeks in the summer and we were able to work here and relax. The sunsets from the balcony never get old and the apartment is fully equipped with anything you basically need. We would definitely come back here.

Our stay at peters airbnb was just what we expected. The most spectacular sunsets on the balcony every night  plenty of space for the 4 of us and the aircon in the main bedroom was very helpful on the hot days. The complex felt safe and the people were very friendly. Great access to main road and surrounding beaches. Highly recommend this place for a family or group of friends that want to enjoy the best of everything that Cape Town has to offer

Dear Peter  thank you so much We loved our stay at your Apartment and would like to come back one day  The View from the big balcony is amazing We have always felt Safe in the Apartment and area. thank you for being such a nice Host  thank you  See you soon xx

Wow what a brilliant apartment which we were very fortunate to stay at for 2 weeks. The views are out of this world. Every night you won't want to leave the place you just need a nice cold drink to sit and enjoy the sunset on the balcony. We were working throughout our stay and loadshedding was not a problem. There is a very powerful inverter installed and the internet is really fast around 50mbps. The kitchen is well equipped and has everything you need. Thank you Peter and Brian for a great stay  hopefully we will be back again next year. Matt  Cari.
Great place  amazing view and Otto is such an amazing host . It really felt like a home away from home . I will definitely be coming back to this beautiful place.

The guest relationship manager  Marianne has been very helpful and the checkin process is never been easy This unit is astonished For a group of 12 people's  we all really enjoyed the stay here. During our stay  there are 2 times blackout but that's give us opportunity to moonbath. Everyone is laid next to the swimming pool to watch the stars  truly unforgettable moment This unit is fully equipped with the kitchen utensils and the women are really enjoy cooking We feel really safe here as the guards is scouting nearby and responsive Isabel also coming in everyday to help on cleaning Highly recommended
We had a great stay at this property. Great locations with spacious rooms and bathrooms. Perfect for family reunions.
Great place to stay and very close to the Beach... Very clean and they had a cleaner come in everyday. Highly recommend staying in the location.
Beautiful space  cleaned every day by cleaner  great location  thanks for our stay
Great place to stay if visiting Camps Bay Incredible views of the mountain and ocean I would definitely recommend Merridew
We had an amazing time  the house is clean and neat

A wonderful resort  in a beautiful city  at an exclusive location central to every place we wished to visit  with expansive amenities and good hospitality.  Certainly a place to back to  again and again.
Awesome host Well detailed space for family vacation. Thank for letting us spend time at your space
Very good
The house is fantastic  well organized and supports many people with a very good equipment for many people ... clean  high quality ... we will come back again
Superb experience.

My family enjoyed our four 4 night stay in comfort.  Merridew is spacious  well appointed  and beautifully furnished.  In particular  I enjoyed the artwork and found each room uniquely themed.  The house is within a 10 minute walk of the beach and local restaurants along along the main waterfront road.   I cannot offer any greater superlatives recommendation  other than I would definitely re-book the property should I visit CapeTown in the future.  Merridew offers tremendous value for your money.
Excellent location  good neighbourhood and excellent value.
amazing  we will definitely be back
Stunning villa in a great location. Highly recommended  well enjoyed with plenty of space for our 2x families of 4.
Awesome place for a big group Hosts were very nice also

Merridew was fantastic for our party of 12. Plenty of room for us all and we never felt on top of each other. Great pool. Comfy beds and pillows. Excellent well equipped kitchen if you wanted to cook. Only a 10 min walk to Camps Bay if you wanted restaurants. Would definitely return again.
Great location. good sized house with enough space for 12 to stay comfortably. Bathrooms are a bit small in some of the rooms but otherwise overall great experience. Thank you.

Location was good and the place was as described. The view was amazing especially during sunset.  During load shedding the backup system is really good and you pretty much dont notice. We had a fun stay.
It was a great place to stay in  and it is beautiful

It was a perfect location for our group of 3 families  10 people in total. Excellent standard  all necessary facilities  basic electric equipment and wifi working independently of load shedding. Very friendly and supportive host.

Great communication with the host. The place was beautiful and well kept as the housekeeper came every day. Felt safe throughout and a great location. All 10 members of our group had an excellent time.

Merridew is a fantastic house with great views  nicely furnished with everything you possibly need. Our group of 10 had a wonderful time and plenty of space. Communication with the host was great and having a housekeeper was a nice addition.

Truly a phenomenal house  very spacious and beautiful. There was a fire in the neighborhood and host was very responsive. The pool was cleaned every day as the ashes of the fire kept going inside the pool. But the best thing from this house was the housekeeper. She was so nice and lovely. We all absolutely loved her and will definitely return.
A fantastic place to stay. A beautiful home looked after brilliantly by Isabella. We can't recommend this holiday home enough
absolutely amazing  highly recommend
Very enjoyable few days spent in Camps Bay. Accommodation was as described and was great for a large group. Bars and restaurants within walking distance. We really enjoyed our stay thank you
Great views  good outside seating and braai area. Fab location.
The house was large neat and very well looked after.  It really felt like a home away from home.  We were received after hours the flight was delayed and everything was friendly and uncomplicated.
Brilliant

Great host. Otto was amazing. The place is at a quiet neighborhood and I loved it  exactly what I needed at the same time it was not far from restaurants and shops an uber ride  less than R60 for a return.
A good place to stay  private  nice quite neighbourhood. Nice area to walk in and the apartment is equipped with more than what you will find at many other - from utensils to amenities.

A wonderful place to spend holidays with friends. The villa is very generously furnished and has surpassed our expectations in every respect - no wishes were left unfulfilled. The hosts are very attentive  courteous and friendly.
Great house  great location  great view
Had a great stay at Otto's place - quick communication  easy access to enter the apartment and great value for money Thank you for hosting me

Quiet and safe neighbourhood for staying and to go for walks.  Amenities great with many extras. Easy access to nearby freeways  close to shopping centre and restaurants. Nice layout  cozy with electric blanket on cold winters nights  Can recommend
Otto was the perfect host. Easy to communicate with and always ready to assist but mindful of giving a guest their space.

Otto was friendly and hospitable but hands off and allowed us to enjoy the space freely. He also went out of his way after we had checked out to hold onto a ring that I had left behind until could make arrangements to go and collect it from him. He was a very accommodating host and the space was neat  clean  convenient and comfortable.

The villa was absolutely stunning and in a great location in Campsbay. The property boasted phenomenal views  was very tastefully decorated and very well kept. The host was also extremely helpful  responsive and friendly - the property was also regularly cleaned throughout our stay. We honestly could not have asked for more and staying here really made our trip and will go down as one of our most memorable trips Thank you
Fabulous home in which to host 10 people very comfortably with plenty of space and great amenities and positioning for seeing Cape Town.
Fantastic house with stunning views
Ideal location and base to utilize for daily trips. We had an awesome time and would strongly recommend this home.
Great property in the perfect location Will stay here again one day
Super great house in a great location The house manager is always there for anything needed. The house has literally everything  loved it

According to the pictures shown on airbnb  our expectations of the accommodation were very high. We were not disappointed  however some details were not quite what we had imagined. Nevertheless  we had a great time in Camps Bay and our stay in Msangasanga was absolutely hassle-free. Thank you.
Very comfortable home in a great location. Can fit a larger group quite well. Amazing patio

Spectacular house  with even more spectacular views. The house was very clean and comfortable. Only a few minutes walk from the beach  shops  and restaurants. We used Uber to travel around to other areas. The host was very helpful and always had a quick response. Would definitely stay again
Great location
Amazing stay  even better than what we expected Very safe  clean and spacious home  Easy to communicate with the host - to book without any hesitation
We loved the place  nice service.
I like it
Wonderful stay This place is great
House is in a great location  walkable to the beach.
We went as a company holiday  and found the entire experience fantastic.  Would love to return in the future.
Nice place. Great host.
Really great space with everything you need
The apartment has everything you need and is in a convenient location. Ottos a great host and always happy to help if needed
Lovely flat to use as a spring board to explore the mother city.
Had a great stay ... a cosy home away from home in a beautifully peaceful suburb. If you want to break away from the city rush and need some peace and quiet  this is the place to be at.
It was nice  peaceful and easy to find.  the place also offers nice view from the bedroom window looking at a green park

I had an excellent stay at Christophe's cottage. It's a cozy  clean  private guest cottage attached to his main home. Great location near the beaches and restaurants. Christophe was very hospitable and invited me to have dinner with him and his family one of the nights.
Great home away from home

This place is not what the photos and description attempt to portray. It is not charming at all It is small  dirty and the furnishings and utensils are totally lacking This place should rent for 500 Rand per night  no more. That is once they control the ant infestation throughout
Definitely a place to stay for business or studies.

Really enjoyed our stay - Christophe was a great host  very accommodating and helpful with tips  questions  etc. The location is great would recommend this area over Camp's Bay for example  and just a walk to the beach  great shops  restaurants. Would highly recommend and stay again
Smooth communication throughout. Very clean place.
Good location and apartment - basement unit  but with walkout little backyard

Great place to stay if you have business to do  in Belville or want to be close to wine routes. Spotlessly clean. Very convenient and has everything needed. Very well equipped to deal with multiple charges for electronics with a number of power-points including two prongs. Comfortable bed. Decent linen. Will definitely be back
Christopher was very accommodating and helpful. Thanks again.
Wonderful place to stay

The location is really good. Parking was easy and the place is spacious. Reasonable value for money and recommended for this reason. It feels secure and was quiet. I was happy to spend almost 3 weeks there.
What a lovely place The apartment was sparkling and had everything we needed. Otto was great and super accommodating host. Had a wonderful stay and we would definitely recommend.
Place exceeded my expectations  and enjoyed my stay thoroughly.

Communication with Kim she looks after the house was good and the location was ideal for a lot of activities. However  there were many dead ants in the flat. The washingmaschine was full of hair inside unfortunately  even after the housekeeper cleaned it  so I had to clean it myself. It was unfortunate  but other than than  the flat is big and has a nice terrace.
Excellent place  compact yet spacious  modern finishes  clean  great location

Es begann damit die Unterkunft zu finden. Die Adresse lautet Zahl A. Wir klingelten erst mal bei den Nachbarn. Er hat dazu nichts in der Check in Information geschrieben. Vor Ort war die Wohnung sehr sehr dreckig. Ameisen in Kche  am Bett  im Wohnzimmer. Im Garten trafen wir auf eine Maus. Der Boden war nicht gewischt und in den Ecken berall Spinnweben. Die Wohnung ist Souterrain. Deutlich dunkler als auf den Fotos dargestellt. Der Garten ist nicht gepflegt. An einer Ecke im Wohnzimmer ist ein Wasserschaden an der Decke. Christophe war jedoch so kulant und hat uns komplett stornieren lasse mit voller Rckerstattung. Was traurig ist Fehler wurden bei Airbnb gemeldet und keine Stunde spter war das gleiche Apartment unter anderer Person wieder online hochgeladen. Scheint als htte er kein Interesse daran die Fehler auszubessern.
Great stay
Really good and comfortable stay. Everything was well positioned and nice touches.

Great host peaceful place and great location great if you travelling for business .Otto is a great host i had no issues and communication was smooth. The place is really beautiful and is suitable for business and for holiday.
Lovely little place but not the best value for money with no save parking no netflix or dstv. Cleaning was billed at a high amount but no cleaning or new bedding  towels in 10 day stay.

Great place  Great location. We were a family of 3 2 Adults 1 child but this house could have fit at least double that. If you want a central place in Cape Town  pls do book with Wendy. They are just such lovely people.
great views  quiet and has everything you need in a house really
Stayed with wendy twice so please read the first review

Otto is very welcoming. The apartment is very neat and clean and pleasant to the eye. If you wish to cook  please ask Otto to supply you with some bowls andor dishes as there aren't any in the kitchen. The pans are also not in great shape  but other than that  it is a lovely place with a stunning view out onto the open areas. The dam is a short walk away and the ducks keep you entertained.
Excellent host. Very tidy  clean and fully fitted unit. My parents had a brilliamt stay and enjoyed it very much. Keep up the great work

We were very happy with both our accommodations and the hospitality of our hosts. We arrived very late Christmas Eve  but still received a warm welcome and Wendy had thoughtfully stocked us with basic groceries and also holiday sweets Everything was very comfortable  spacious and attractive--worked well for our family of four. Only caution is for anyone with physical challenges  as one of the bedrooms is up a set of steep stairs and a second down a step or two. The area was pleasant and well located even with only taxis for 6 days--we visited Groot Constantia  Robben Island  Kirstenbosch  and were picked up for a wonderful tour of the Wine Country. Wendy and her husband are great hosts.

Our family had a wonderful stay at Wendy and Walters house in Rondebosch. With three kids the space and the little pool were really nice. We also made good use of the outside braai We stayed for a week and it was the perfect location to explore Cape Town. It was good value for money.  the Pannekoek family.
A very pleasant and relaxing place to stay with excellent hosts who are warm  friendly and extremely helpful.  A great stay.
Wendy is a very pleasant and caring person. She organized a brand new cot for our little baby we had a good time in a lovely accommodation. Absolutely recommendable
A deceptively large and comfortable oasis in Rondebosch. Wendy and her husband were warm  welcoming and super helpful to my colleagues and I.

The accommodation is very spacious and homely  perfect for 6 of us. Wendy was quick to respond and very helpful since the day we contacted her. She guided us to her place which was easy to find and the checking in process was very smooth. The house is very well equipped and looks exactly like the lovely pictures provided on the review. It is also centrally located to major tourist attractions and close to supermarkets and restaurants including the factory outlet stores. The house itself is a perfect retreat after a long day exploring Cape Town. Wendy and Walter are wonderful hosts  very welcoming and friendly  which made our trip to Cape Town a memorable one. Highly recommended to anyone visiting Cape Town.

Karen's house is so amazing We really enjoyed these three days when we stayed in Karen's house It is warm and comfortable Everybody are very nice And also  we love the breast fast Thanks   all of you  Karen Hope see you again

I didnt stay myself at Wendy's house  but my family did. All of them  grandma  aunt and uncles  said great things about Wendy. They required me to leave her a review on their behalf.  Wendy was an extraordinary host  going above and beyond to make them feel at home.  She provided all support  and took care of all the little things. Just as an example of her kindness   they said she prepared a fruit basket to welcome them  she helped with a cellphone they needed. They really appreciated these gestures and many many others during their trip Wendy  thanks for taking care of my family

The Rondebosch location was a fine location to access Capetown affordably by taxi  then return to a quiet  peaceful  nicely appointed home. We had all we needed and the place afforded three adults spaces to be together as well as our privacy and own en suite baths. Wendy and Walter were consummate hosts. They guided us in the right direction for our Garden Route tour  and assisted us in making plans for a safari. We enjoyed spending time chatting over a glass of wine and learning about life in their country. I can't say enough about our stay  Highly recommend.
Otto is very professional and responsive. Really enjoyed my stay at the lovely apartment

Wendy is very friendly and gave us a warm welcome with a quick tour around the place. She has also put up some useful information about the apartment and has even left pamphlets about restaurants in the vicinity. The apartment was clean  very comfortable and had everything there that you might need for a self-cater stay. The apartment is also easy to find and close to highway access. Loved the stay there  only wish it could have been for longer.

Wendy was extremely welcoming and made us feel right at home. We were a group of six and had pleanty of space to spread out. The place is very charming and relaxing. It was a great location for seeing all the sites. We would stay there again.
A comfortable cosy place close to the city and table mountain. Wendy and Walter were very welcoming and helpful. We had amazing weather so everyday was amazing
Rigtig fin bolig. Meget tt p Capetown. Wendy var hurtig til at svare og eget hjlpsom. Vi var glade for poolen. Pnt og rent.
Outstanding hosts in a very quiet well equipped house  we enjoyed a fantastic stay and will most certainly rent the place again in the future when going to Cape Town
Wendy was such a nice host We would love to stay at hers again.
We really enjoyed our stay at Wendy's accommodation in Rondebosch. The place was nice and clean and Wendy was a lovely host -

We were made extremely welcome.  Was like home away from home  Thank you to Wendy and Walter they made us feel extremely welcome.  Lovely neighbourhood  central access to all areas  felt safe always.  Lovely people  lovely place  thank you

Wendy was very welcoming and the house was comfortable.  It was not obvious from the description that the house backed onto the M5 motorway.  There is not a lot of natural light so in the evenings and in autumn and winter the lights need to be on.  The wifi is not able to stream music or video.

The accommodation is very clean and comfortable.   Off street parking for your car and very safe and secure.  The house is very spacious.   The beds are very comfortable with good quality linnen.  The location was excellent only 15 min from the airport and 10minutes from Black river Park where we needed to be for visas purposes.   Wendy is a very attentive host.  She responded very quickly to all emails and made sure we knew exactly how to get to the address.   We will recommend this accommodation and will make use of it again. Thank you Wendy for hosting us.

We had a lovely stay and were well looked after by Wendy's son and his wife since they were on vacation. Nice big house in a nice neighbourhood  with full bathroom and toilet in each bedroom - and electrically-heated mattresses  a real bonus for winter. Only downside was the poor internet connection over the first few days  but this was quickly fixed.

Ce que je retiendrai de ce sjour chez Wendy c'est avant tout son sourire sa gentillesse sa disponibilit et son sens de l'accueil qui fait de ce logement un endroit o l'on se sent bien. Merci pour son hospitalit et les petites attentions trs personnelles qui ont fait de ce sjour un moment particulier.
Wendy is a very good owner. The house is beautiful and clean. We can use the Wifi in the house. When I left I lost my hat in her house  she found it and keeped it  for me. Now I already get it.Thanks
Great place  lots of space and lovely hosts.

Comfortable and cosy cottage in a beautiful neighborhood. The cottage had all the amenities you could have needed including air-conditioning for the hot summer days. Wendy and Walter were attentive and friendly. All you could ask for in a home away from home
Superb setting  thoroughly enjoyed our stay  thank you

We had a lovely stay in Cape Town in Wendy's home. It was a very comfortable and well located base for us and great for the kids. We didn't spend too much time there though as we were out and about as well as visiting family nearby. In terms of location  comfort and security  it was a great spot. Thank you Wendy

We absolutely loved our stay at Wendy and Walter's home. It was almost as if it was our second home. Location provided the perfect balance between work commitments and play. The space was more than ample and having the home serviced during the day was a huge plus. We loved the outdoor BBQ  especially the time shared with our hosts chatting about life in South Africa. We hope to return soon

Fabulous hosts. Couldn't be more helpful. If you are looking to relax and sunbathe around the pool it prob is a bit cramped if you are a large group and it's very shady. Uber is a great option to use if not booking a car as public transport is not really an option. If you want to be away from the hustle and bustle it's a fab location.
Its a lovely wooden and romantic house in the most clean and comfortable district of cape town.The hosts are very nice.
Merci Wendy et Walter pour l'accueil  La maison est trs propre et confortable  avec une salle de bain dans chaque chambre. Wendy nous a donn beaucoup de conseils pour les visites  c'est super

Very homely and comfortable. Has character  especially in the attic room. The beds are very comfortable and the kitchen well equipped  though we never had time to use it It's very suburban in that area so about 10-15 mins walk to nearest area of shops  but taxis are so easy to get it's almost not worth mentioning. Hosting friendly and unobtrusive  exactly as you would want
Beautiful setting in a safe and secluded area  easy access to amenities  highways and shops all around the area. Clean  modern and cosy room  will definitely visit again.
Great efficient service from Otto. Also sufficient lighting during load shedding

Otto was extremely friendly and welcoming on arrival. The place was as advertised. We had to do lots of laundry and this was not an issue. I especially liked that the clothes line was in an enclosed area. This avoided us having to worry about strong winds and rain. Belleville is a suburb but if you have a car  its within an hour mostly 30-40minutes of so many attractions. I would definitely stay again.
The house is actually more nice than it looks on pictures

This establishment was perfectly located for our needs. Wendy went out of her way to accommodate us and we felt really at home. Small things made a big difference  like 2 prong adapters next to the bed for charging mobile phones  fresh milk in the fridge and a bowl of fresh fruit. Thank you Wendy.
Great stay in suburb of Cape Town.
We enjoyed our staye at Wendys. She was very welcoming and helpful. The accommodation has everything you need to ensure a comfortable stay. Great location too  with quick access to everywhere

Wendy is a wonderful host  very knowledgable about the city highlights  concerned about little details and she made us feel at home a very cozy home. Everything was just perfect and she even manage to arrange some wonderful flowers for a special occasion my 80th mom's birthday. We've rented a car and it was very easy to go out and in Wendy's house. It made our staying at Cape Town very special. Thank you Wendy

Wendys house is great for a few days in Cape Town. It takes about 10min into town by car and its not far from the airport either. The rooms are well spaced and we had all we needed. Wendy and her husband were considered and attentive hosts.
Convenient location. Nice and spacious accommodation.
Lovely hosts - very kind and informative with local tips. Great location for seeing the many Cape highlights

What a gem of a place We thoroughly enjoyed our time at Wendys place. The photos and descriptions are very accurate. I even found the place better than depicted. There were 5 of us in total and we had more than enough space. I definitely recommend this spot Im from Canada  Wendy was fantastic with her quick responses and answered all our questions within a blink Cant wait to visit Cape Town and Wendy again.

Wir sind sehr hflich und gastfreundlich empfangen worden. Man kann sagen wir waren zu Gast bei Freunden zu Hause. Gerne kommen wir wieder und empfehlen es auch allen unseren Freunden.  Schne Tage. Reiner
WendyWendy

A fantastic place to stay--easily a 1510 The rooms are well-aquipped with anything you could possibly need while on vacation. It's a beautiful  clean place with great common spaces and individual rooms. There's even a swimming pool. More significantly  Wendy is the sweetest host  who takes pride in making sure that her guests have a terrific time staying in her home and exploring Cape Town. She gave great recommendations of places to eat and recreate and even  at times  provided short rides Expect a terrific time if you stay with Wendy
Loved the place. Better than the pictures. Clean  spacious  stylish  each room has an ensuite bathroom and safe and secure parking. What a pleasure.

We stayed at Wendys place for a week while we toured Cape Town and visited our daughter who is a student at UCT. Wendys home was the perfect place for us as it is nicely decorated  clean  in a great  central location for tourists and is situated in a quiet and safe neighborhood. Wendy and her husband are excellent hosts they are welcoming and helpful and very easy to reach with questions  yet they allowed us space to wander in and out as we toured the beautiful city sights and beaches nearby.  Off street parking was also great because we rented a car for the week. I would like to add that  although the home has WiFi  it is somewhat weak and unreliable. This was not an issue for us and did not in any way deter from our amazing stay  but anyone who may be dependent on a strong signal may want to know.
Wonderful friendly host Very Lekker place to stay at. Everything you need  nice and central  great for work trips

We had a lovely stay. The house was perfect for us and its location with regards to the Two Oceans venue could not have been better. The house was very clean  with a very cosy  relaxing ambience. Thank you so much for the friendly reception
Great place if you are out and  about all day as this place is very central.

The pictures  description and budget category are accurate and we got what we expected  plus Wendy and family's hospitality and friendly care. This was a work stay and I would love to go back and stay there for a family holiday. The house offers an excellent base for explorations of the Western Cape  and Wenda as a seasoned hostess has great advice in this regard.
Wendy is a superb host and the overall experience was enjoyed by all 3 couples staying there. Great braai bbq facilities
We had a lovely and comfortable stay while the area is safe and central to most parts of the city. Wendy is a friendly host that can be recommended..

Wendy  and husband Wally  were great hosts.  They grocery shopped for us per our short list prior to our arrival  and went out of their way to take us to the airport on our return.  Wendy was helpful in recommending restaurants and in advancea private tour guide for 2 tours.  They chatted if it seemed we wanted to  but left us to ourselves when we wanted privacy.  the house was clean and cheerful.  beds VERY comfortable on the firm side.  Bed linens crisp  bath towels thick and soft Kitchen had whatever we needed. Patio was so calming...we were there in late October  so pool not warm yet  but didn't matter  as it added to the ambiance.   Only thing to consider is that whoever has upstairs beds will have a steep set of stairs to climb...we were ok  but  might affect someone else.  If we return to Cape Town  we would definitely stay here again.

The house was exactly as described and was very spacious  clean and  very comfortable.   Three nice sized bedrooms and four updated bathrooms. Fully appointed kitchen with everything you need to do some home cooking. Although there was only the two of us my husband and I we found the space to be exactly what we needed....to be able to relax and unwind after a long days of sightseeing. Wendy was the perfect host.  The day we arrived we needed to grab a few groceries and Wendy offered to drive us to the local Woolworth's about 2 kms away.  Not only did Wendy drive us but she waited while we picked up our groceries That is definitely going the extra mile. Both Wendy and her husband made us feel right at home.  We would definitely recommend Wendy's place for comfort  a lovely quiet neighbourhood and for such gracious hospitality.

A wonderful stay at Wendys place. Would definitely recommend for location and a great space for a family. Easy access to local amenities and the airport. Excellent and responsive hosts

great hospitality and so much space We felt like home. We had an amazing stay and were even allowed to stay longer because our flight was going quite late. We would definitely recommend this apartment to families

Wendy's place was a delightful stay for my family of four. We were very comfortable  enjoyed the patio area and were able to spread out through the many rooms. A mall was nearby with a grocery store and a couple restaurants. We highly recommend it and would definitely stay again.

Nicky was a fabulous host  very welcoming and with good tips. The house was very comfortable and had everything we needed. The location is great for exploring different areas of the city. I'd highly recommend staying with Wendy.

Extremely helpful hosts who went out of their way to help in every way they could.

We wholeheartedly recommend Wendys place  it meets all expectations as listed and Wendy is a fantastic host.

Otto has been a great host  we moved to his newly setup place and never had issue as he tried his best to cater for whatever we need. Great area  extremely safe and near to large malls. Highly recommended.

Ottawa was a great host who was responsive to any request and flexible in our checkin and checkout. I'd recommend him and his place to anyone.

Ideal for anyone who needs to visit the medical campus of Stellenbosch University for a short while  as it's an easy 12km trip there. Great value for money

There is even DSTV available with all the channels AND Wifi. Great place to stay if you're looking to experience all the vibrance that the city has to offer. We also felt very safe we're from Joburg  so that's almost never the case. Would definitely recommend.
