Situation idale pour visiter la ville et la region  tout est a proximit. Aucune hesitation  l'appartement est parfait  place de parking dans un parking adjacent  piscine et salle de sport vraiment dispo  wifi  trs bien quip... Il n'y a pas de pige.

The condo has a great location  very close to Bree St. It is perfect for a long weekend stay and to enjoy the city. The staff is friendly and polite. Innthe summer it can get quite warm you have to leave the windows open and turn on the fans.
Views of Table Mountain were superb. Apartment was as described. Thanks for a great stay.

This place is fabulous. It has everything you need for a comfortable stay complete with stunning views  a posh community pool  security and a gated parking garage. The whole experience was seamless. James even checked in on us to ensure everything was up to par. Thank you James for the lovely stay

Both balcony views just stunning and the star of the stay. Modern flat in a busy central location  felt safe in the day.  Good pool and friendly staff in the Terraces.  Supermarkets nearby as well as bus stop right outside for Table Mountain and other attractions.  Walking tours started 5 mins away.  Jazz club 3 mins away and loads of coffee shops.  No air conditioning meant using the three fans and having doors open.  Used Uber at night  quick and reasonable.  Good introduction to wonderful Cape Town.
Schne Unterkunft in zentraler Lage mit Aussicht auf den Tafelberg. Schafraum in oberer Etage schn  war im Februar etwas warm.
What a lovely apartment. Enjoyed our stay immensely. James was also a great host to answer any questions we had. The pool was also another lovely bonus in the heat of Cape Town
Our family enjoyed our stay at Tanyas unit. We appreciate the attention to detail and would recommend it to any future visitors.

If you're coming to the city and want to be smack bang in the heart of everything - this apartment is perfect Walking distance to all of the fantastic bars  restaurants and shops etc. Wonderful views across table mountain from the balcony. Perfect location - highly recommended

Excellent apartment you can sit on the balcony looking a table top mountain. It has the use of a lovely swimming pool and gym  it is very secure and the apartment itself is spacious for a 1 bedroom with all facilities you need to enjoy your stay. I have no hesitation in recommending this apartment

We had a brilliant stay at this air bnb. The location is so central for everything in Cape Town- long street is a quick walk away  there is a bus stop for camps bay right outside the hotel. The apartment itself was very clean  modern and had a brilliant view of table mountain. The only thing like everyone else says on the reviews was the air conditioning as there is none- ours was particularly windy week so we couldn't have the doors open which meant it was quite hot but we were expecting that from the reviews. James was very quick to respond to our queries. We loved our stay and would recommend it to everyone.
We have had a great time in James' loft. The loft is in the very heart of Cape Town  the view is absolutely amazing  all the staff at the reception are helpful. We will come back....
I absolutely loved my stay here. I would definitely book again next time I come to Cape Town
Really cool penthouse-like place in the city. Gorgeous view and very central.

Great apartment for a stay in Cape Town. Good location for Bree street etc. The apartment and the block had all the facilities you need including a decent gym and a nice pool. The only slightly annoying thing was that the parking space is on the last floor of the block which meant having to drive up and down for 5 mins to get in and out. But we got used to it.
Beautiful views

Excellent apartment and great value. The location was a perfect base for exploring Cape Town. We had a rental car which was safe in the attached and secured parking garage for days we did not use it. There's really no need for one unless you are doing a daytrip out to the suburbs or Cape Point which we did. And the balcony is a great spot for sitting outside with a drink before heading off to dinner. Highly recommend
Everything was great during our stay. Highly suggest uber or taxi when leavingreturning at night. Apartment was clean and had great views. Very comfortable as well.

This Cape Town flat was an absolutely perfect It was clean  beautiful  comfortable and has amazing views. The check in and check out was flawless. Security happily watched our bags the last day before we headed to the airport. The next time we go to Cape Town  we'll definitely stay here. A perfect experience
James is an excellent host He checked in with us multiple times before and during our stay  and ensured that we had a great time. Would highly recommend this apartment to all visitors in Cape Town.

James' modern and will fitted apartment is absolutely beautiful  with two balconies with great view on Table Mountains. There is everything one needs and more we stayed 6 days  but could have stayed much longer kitchen is well equiped  beautiful bathroom  VERY comfortable bed plenty of closets and so tasteful and spotless. The building  such interesting architecture is very secure guardians are friendly and helpful. Museums basic shopping and Long street are all walking distance for the Gardens or Waterfront areas  one will need to take cabs... But the neighborhood was perfect for us. Thanks..
Amazing location with stunning views and great communication from host  would definitely stay again
Everything exceeded our expectations  would definitely recommend the place
Great secure and central location Great views of table mountain as well James was responsive and friendly throughout the entire process.

James' place was by far one of the best apartments I've stayed in Loved the multi-story  two bathrooms  and all the amenities of home.   Nothing like the view of Table Mountain from the bed  James was extremely quick to respond and to provide local tips.  Really happy with the stay. Thanks James
James was great  always responded very quickly and accurately. The place is in a excellent location Would come back without doubt
Appartement formidable. Excellente deco  quipement tres pratique. Soon du detail. Exceptionnel

Ideally situated  incredible views of Table Mountain  fast Wi-Fi  entrance is next to taxi rank and myciti bus stop  and 5 minutes walk to the famous Long Street with all its pubs and restaurants.  This place is ideal for a visit to Cape Town  and James was a fantastic host.
Great location in downtown. We found some fun restaurants near by. Awesome views of table mountain from 2 balconys. Would recommend for travelers wanting a walkable area

The apartment is in a great location close to long street and all of the amenities you need as a tourist. Everything in the apartment is as described and it has great views of table mountain from 2 nice balconies. Only problem was we didn't get to use it as much as we would have liked as there is so much to do in Cape Town Would love to return again. Great communication throughout the process. I would highly recommend.

James's apartment met all of our needs for my husband and I  and James himself was a very responsive and accommodating host. The apartment was a large  modern space with two balconies and a great view of table mountain. The building was extremely secure with multiple key fob entries and security guards at each entrance. We arrived late in the evening on Christmas Eve night and I was worried about finding food  groceries to have for the few days we were there. But James was a huge help  leaving some snack foods and fruit for us. He recommended a few places to grab coffee and eat on Christmas day as well  which we tried out.  All in all we had a great stay

A location in the heart of everything Cape Town has to offer. Two stories with balconies boasting spectacular views of the skyline and Table Mountain. Amenities included coffee  new quality appliances  bath and shower  and clean  soft towels and sheets. James was responsive  and even facilitated an early check-in. Many thanks for making our first experience one to remember - we will be back

timo apartamento - as fotos reproduzem exatamente a realidade  -  muito bem localizado  proximo a tudo  e com tima estrutura de segurana. James  um anfitrio cuidadoso  que est sempre atento s necessidades dos hspedes  mesmo que  distncia.
Great location  very helpful host
Huippu sijainti. Kaunis sisustus. Terasseilta suora nkym pytvuorelle.
It is a very nice villa with a fantastic view over the ocean Close to Simonstown and Cape of Good Hope Thank you for everything We will come back

We had an amazing stay at rosalind's house the view is stunning  it's a quiet and wonderfull place with so much comfort and space and has a great terrace. I can totally recommend staying there  it's such a special place and so close to the beautifull villages like Simons town and Kalk Bay
Beautiful views over False Bay - rather a climb up to the property but worth it. No TV but DVD player available.

Cape Point Cottage was absolutely lovely. There is a great attention to detail and everything you could want - an outdoor grill  a wood burning oven   a fabulous bathroom  sweeping ocean views  a comfortable bed  a well-stocked kitchen and exceptionally kind hosts. I cannot wait to go back.
Overall great experience. Hope to stay here again next time I am in Cape Town.

This apartment was incredibly nice. It is right in the middle of the city  yet its super quiet. The view from both the top and bottom terraces is unbelievable with Table Mountain right in front. The apartment was worth every penny.  James  the host  was very timely and responsive. No complaints at all.

The apartment is located in the center of the city with easy access to tourist spots. The view from the living room and bedroom balconies is gorgeous. The bed is comfortable and the bathroom is nice. Would highly recommend
Lovely apartment  convenient for exploring Cape Town.

Fantastic place. Nicely located in a walkable neighborhood. James quickly replied to all questions and checked in periodically during our 5 night stay. Very clean and modern. Handy to have washing machine as well. Balcony which is perfect for a morning coffee or breakfast overlooking table mountain. Would not hesitate to stay here again. Just flawless. Thank you James

We LOVED Jame's apartment - it was spacious  comfortable and the views of Table Mountain from both balconies were a real treat. If you've chosen to stay in the heart of Cape Town then this spot is hard to beat. Walking distance to great bars and cafes  Bo Kaap  Distrct 6 museum  Long St  Bree St etc and the Red Tourist Bus stops. Highly recommend...
Great location right in the heart of the city and convenient for getting about by Uber. Lovely apartment and great communication from James.
Clean  perfect location  easy going host and nice view from the two  balconies. Definitely recommendable. Who love to stay here again. Thanks

James' place is just as beautiful as advertised. The two balconies have a stunning view and the apartment is very family friendly. Communicating with James is very easy and prompt. The location of the apartment makes it easy to walk around to some of the better spots.
Great place with an outstanding view  highly recommended
Great space with beautiful views
Our stay in Cap Town was wonderfull  the appartment is well located and fully equiped. The car park was practical and the Table montain view verry appreciate. I recommand.
James is a great host.
Very nice place. Great location and views. Quick and helpful communications
Great location for launching an early morning adventure to the Cape of Good Hope Very communicative host  relaxing atmosphere  and great views.
Secluded  safe and very scenic - on the doorstep to Cape Point and with the divine Miller's Point sea baths a few minutes away

It looked beautiful on the pictures  but it's even more beautiful in real life. We loved the layout of the cottage. The fire was burning when we arrived  and there is nothing more cozy and inviting than that. We stayed there with our 1 and 3 year old and for them it was magical. Seeing the mountain and the ocean  lots of steps and a great jungle gym. We will definitely go again.
Lovely view of the ocean  beautiful garden and tranquil accommodation. Highly recommended.
Great getaway location.
This is a terrific hidden gem of a place to contemplate  relax  and base yourself to explore all the area has to offer. Ill be back.

This is such a gem of a place We stayed for four nights  and wish we could've stayed longer. The pictures don't do it justice - the view is incredible  the two patios are lovely  and the staff on site are wonderful. We visited nearby Cape Point Nature Reserve a few times during our stay  and were glad to be staying close enough that we could beat the crowds. Thank you  Rosalind

This perfect cottage exceeded all of our expectations. The location and view are stunning and convenient for exploring Cape Point and all of the small towns along the Indian Ocean. The cottage was sparkling clean and we appreciated the hiking trails  candlelit nights and lovely patios. We cant wait to return

Lovely  clean loft with  a great view of Table Mountain.  Location is in a more diverse area of the city center but good security measures at the Adderly location.  Very close to the  beautiful Company Gardens .
Great place with a fantastic view.  Highly recommend
We loved our stay at James place Great apartment  secure building  and amazing views Great communication with our host  great help from staff. We would definitely recommend James place
Nice apartment and excellent host.
Appartement parfaitement situ et trs scuris.  Place de parking trs pratique.
A beautiful apartment with a great view in the center of Cape Town.

James's place is so wonderful really spacious and great to be on two floors with balconies on both. the view of table mountain is truly incredible and we found the location incredibly useful- right in the middle of everything

This apartment was a great central spot to stay in Cape Town. The view alone made this a stunner At the top of a very safe and secure building the apartment was super spacious and I would for sure recommend this place if you want to stay in the city centre.
Great location and wonderful view You can experience almost everything from this place A bit fresh in spring time  but it is no problem during night. Highly recommended
Good place  felt safe   easy communication with James  nothing to complain about
The appartement was great and the view of Table Mountain was stunning The location is great but if you travel alone as a woman as I did I might not suggest it

A great place to stay in the centre of Cape Town. The apartment was as described and had everything we needed for our 4 night stay. James answered my queries very quickly  . I would definitely recommend this as an excellent base from which  to explore the city.

James' apartment is stylish and has stunning views of table mountain. There is a taxi rank situated right outside  with the VA Waterfront being a 10 min drive away depending on traffic. It's central location is near the long street hop-on-hop-off bus stop and Company Gardens. James also kept in regular contact to ensure everything was ok during our stay.
There is just enough light to see inside the cottage  plenty of candles is you prefer it cosy.

Zelden in zon mooi  bijzonder en romantisch huisje op zon prachtige plek verbleven. Kaarsjes  bad  open haard. Spectaculair uitzicht op de oceaan. Wel tijdig inkopen doen om zelf te kunnen koken  winkels op enige afstand. Verde prima uitvalsbasis voor een bezoek aan Kaap de Goede Hoop.

Beautiful cottage Amazing view of ocean and mountain  with nice trail from the cottage. Very close to cape point and boulders beach pinguins. Also lovely visit to Simons town. We were received very kindly and the house was looked after when we were gone. You will not regret staying here for sure
Even better than the photographs

Well equipped rustic feeling cottage in a great location with an ocean view and nice outside areas. Short drive to Simons Town which is a fascinating place with an active navy base and thus lots of history and character. Also easy striking distance to the Cape of Good Hope and Cape Point.
Amazing spot
Excellent service
A beautiful environmentally sensitive hide-away from the City. Mountain and sea all in super-comfortable ease.
Great place. And the views are amazing. Worth the trip and close to all the surrounding areas

Absolutely stunning location in arguably the most beautiful stretch of road in the Cape. You dont come for design or luxury  you come here for a getaway  to let the wind and water and mountain clear your head.  Runnerbikeryogihikers dream. The little cottage is tucked into the mountain if you like a nestled feeling but the showstopper is the main house  which has stunning panoramic views of all of False Bay from the bedroom and bath tub.  Rosalind was super helpful and generous in moving me from the cabin to the house when the water heater broke as they do.  Would love to come back and soak in the view again. FYI you need your own car  there are friendly dogs on the property and its a short hike up to the house.
Lovely get away from Cape Town . Tranquil setting great service
Such a beautiful space. Absolutely everything you need  and the most remarkable light.

Off the grid cabin  tucked away in a beautiful garden above road  shared by 2 other cabins but offering great privacy. Fire place a win  with amazing views of mountain from bed and sea from lounge. Great marked walks into mountain. Will be back
This is a piece of heaven. We loved our stay here
This is a one of a kind experience  surrounded by nature  highly recommended
We had a wonderful stay at the cottage  the view is wonderful. The kids loved the ature walks and the dogs. A really nice place.
This is a beautiful off the grid cottage...but solar powered and with all the mod-cons.  The view is wonderful and the location is ideal for exploring Simon Town and Cape of Good Hope.
A homely and most comfortable stay with THE most amazing view. Loved being off the grid and being surrounded by candlelight.
Highly recommended. A wonderful getaway  stunning views  cosy and close to nature.

This place is a bit out of town but that is its absolute beauty. A rustic charm of peace and quiet with all the amenities you would like hen travelling. It is a wonderful setting when lit by candles and all that can be heard is the roll of the sea and the weather. A truly great place to stay.

Very clean  amazing craftsmanship  sweeping ocean views  gorgeous walkways. Tarisai was extremely helpful and thoughtful and his coworker helped carry our luggage up the stairs  A wonderful way for us to recuperate and relax after what felt like 3 days of traveling to arrive in this beautiful country an 11 hour and 13 hour flight.  Also  our first night here we enjoyed being able to unwind and relax in the bath surrounded by candlelight. Absolutely one of my favourite places ever.  The two dogs we met were adorable and friendly - so sweet  It was lovely being surrounded by all the jungle greenery and ocean views. Highly recommend this place

Wir waren eine Woche in diesem Appartement und waren begeistert von der Lage  der Wohnung  dem Blick auf den Tafelberg und der hervorragenden Kommunikation mit dem Gastgeber. Es hat alles super geklappt und wir wrden immer wieder kommen.

This apartment is pretty much spot-on. Location wise you are close to all the bars and restaurants  and walking distance to the Waterfront if you can be bothered with the walk only about R30 for an uber if youd rather not walk. It has a pool which is great for chilling during the day although only 4 sunloungers this actually didnt prove to be an issue  and plenty of sunshine all day. A downstairs loo and upstairs bathroom is really helpful  and the kitchen contains everything you would need. Superb views of Table Mountain from both balconies were a winning point for us. All in all  a really good stay

Really enjoyed  our stay at James' apartment. Nicely laid out  lots of space  great views in a really secure building. Staff at both receptions were really helpful and friendly.  Nice surprise to have the swimming pool open given I have received a mail saying due to the ongoing water shortage  it would be closed. Nice touch to have pool towels provided separately. My only critique was for 2 ladies traveling on their own  there were  2 evenings when the road outside was closed to traffic which meant we were not able to Uber door to door which did make us feel uncomfortable walking the final part of our way home late in the evening - not to be recommended. Uber is highly recommend as the way to get around the city and beyond  reliable and affordable.
Trs bon emplacement et terrasse agrable. Piscine agrable. Accs  la place de parking un peu fastidieux.

A comfortable stay  nestled in the heart Cape Town on the edge of CBD.  Ideal for if you need to be centrally located great combo of a hideaway in the mix. The condo complex offers a lovely private  community vibe when enjoying the pool and opportunity to interact with locals and travelers.

We had a lovely stay in this comfortable apartment  very centrally located  with gorgeous views. It was easy to communicate with James and the staff at the apartment building were friendly and helpful.

Sometimes you hit it right.  And with James place we did.  Without any knowledge of location or neighborhood or local features we were shooting blind except for the ratings.  What a great experience    Great location near walking distance to many of the areas and attractions you will want to see - and easy access to transport for those a bit further away.  Security was a top concern and we felt very comfortable with the secure building and of course being in the penthouse.  Take it - you will love it and move on to your other tasks knowing this one is done.  The views of Table Top are great from both balconies and nice to wake up looking out at it.

James appartment is exactly as described. A very secure building in Cape Town city centre with amazing views. The location is great for eateries and transport links. Lovely comfy bed. The car park space provided came in very useful. James was very quick to respond to any messages I sent him. WHEN we return to Cape Town on holiday  I will be looking up this apartment to stay in again.
If you like nature and quite while still being accessible to town this is the place to be. Spectacular location Spotlessly clean Super hospitality Thank you
Great cottage in lovely location.

Great location to escape... perfect for a writer who wants to get away from it all or a couple that just wants some alone time.  Truly off the grid for electric and water. The kitchen supplies were a nice surprise. It's still a cabin feel but really so much more The proximity to both Cape Point and Simon's Town was great.  A very distinctive and unique property. The strong winds at night and the warm temperatures were a little more than expected but still I would highly recommend this place for people who just need to escape.
Lovely cottage nestled into the side of the mountain - you'll encounters birds and butterflies while drinking coffee and enjoy a stunning view of the ocean waters. Beautiful spot  lovely hospitality.
A great cottage on the coast. It was lovely with the wind blowing and cooking in the candlelight.  A wonderful place to stay if your going to Cape Point early in the Morning.
A beautiful location with the best view.  A very romantic place
A quiet  picturesque retreat.
Nice place  simple but comfortable. Splendid views
A nice little nock to hide away and stare at the ocean for hours. Lovely little cottage with everything you need. We enjoyed every bit if it.
Beautiful little cottage on the side of the mountain. Gorgeous bedroom and bathroom off the grid with stone walls. Stunning beaches and mountain walks nearby. Wish our stay was longer

We were in desperate need of a weekend away and Rosalinds place really did the trick It was lovely to have an expansive view of the ocean while sitting by the fire  or cooking in the open and well-stocked kitchen. Rosalinds place really is tucked away in the mountain and the energy of nature and sea is overwhelming. Special thank you to Ayanda and Tarisai for making our stay extra special.
Had an amazing stay with my girlfriend  walked down to Smitswinkle beach. The staff where super helpful on the property helping whenever needed. Beautiful house with lush nature.

We couldnt have loved this more. One of the best stays weve had in the world The view is mesmerising  the ocean is so close by and the dogs are a delight. There are wonderful short hikes behind the house and at night you go to sleep to the the sound of a river and sweetly croaking frogs. We will definitely be back.
Beautiful cottage  highly recommended
What a magical place Absolutely beautiful. Thank you Rosalind

The cottage is lodged between the mountain  the deep blue sea. It is very well equipped  we had everything we needed. It is a must for nature lovers. The area is breathtakingly beautiful but beware of the baboons. We loved our stay. Thank you.
An absolutely magical trip Cannot wait to be back soon. Thank you for the wonderful hospitality Rosalind and Tersai

The cottage is enchanting  peaceful and immersed in nature with an exquisite view. The ambiance is warm and cosy and everything we needed was in the space. It certainly is a hidden gem for some downtime.
A wonderful stay as usual. What a treat
A beautiful space to disconnect and relax
It is a very quiet place with the mountains behind and the see in frontpecially  for those who want to disconneted and be relaxed but there is wifi during the day.
Fantastic stay Beautiful sunrises. Awesome dogs. We loved it and will be back
Breathtaking views all round and tucked within the most lovely fynbos garden. We loved our stay and plan to return soon
Highly recommend for a romantic and relaxing staycation just outside the city Really easy access to the nature reserve  and a perfect place to just chill.
Worth a visit for sure 3
Really beautiful place. Have stayed here a few times and always love it.
The most beautifully tranquil getaway. An off-the-grid dreamscape to unwind into. Such kind and welcoming hosts with the sweetest dogs

Such an amazing escape to unwind and enjoy the beautiful surroundings. Light the fire and relax in such a relaxing space with the most incredible views of the mountains and ocean. We will definitely be back. Thanks Rosalind for an incredible stay.
What a great place to relax and enjoy nature. Despite being completely off-grid there was nothing missing  I had a great stay.

Where do I begin to describe this heaven on earth  words will not do justice. Nestled between the majestic backdrop of the mountains and the ocean is this gem  which offers the perfect escape  exactly what I needed. You receive water that is pure from the mountains and the cleanest air possible with gorgeous mornings  there is no place like it among various Airbnbs I tried in Cape Town. Cape of Good Hope National Park is at your doorstep and the gorgeous beach of the Swinkelssmith Bay is on the way with many other breathtaking hiking possibilities  and Simonstown is a 5 minute drive if you need anything. My first day here  I made friends with the most wonderful dogs possible who took me on a walk up to the mountains  such a special treat this was. But they are very well behaved and will keep their distance if you are allergic. Even more than this beautiful place  I am grateful to have met these beautiful hosts. I was fortunate to spend time with Joel before Roz arrived  and he is one of the most gentle souls I have met in my journey. I learned so much about South Africa and its history from his unique perspective Roz and Joel were most accommodating and did everything possible to make my stay perfect. Also a very special thanks to Tarisai who is on the property to answer to any needs you may have including laundry and cleaning. He is very responsive and respectful. I have collected beautiful memories here and hope to be back one day. Thank you
An absolute gem the venue and the service exceeded all my expectations. I'll be back soon
A wonderful place off-grid and quiet in a beautiful space and surrounds.  So many good hikes around and the national park so close
What a magical place Thanks again for the amazing hospitality  comfortable beds and beautiful space.
A truly special spot with unmatched sea views. A perfect escape pod from city life.
We had en enjoyable stay. However the steps to reach the cottage are quite difficult.

What a little gem. Thank you so much  Rosalind and Joel  for accommodating our last-minute request to stay in your place. We loved its seclusion  its comfy bed  the views of both the ocean and the mountain  and your thoughtful touches. It gave us the perfect opportunity to relax and unplug for a night  we would have stayed longer if we'd had the time. Thank you
Perfect location for wildlife lovers
Great place in a beautiful spot. Comfy beds and restful nights sleep.

This was absolutely an amazing experience off-grid with a breathtaking view. We loved the dogs that came by time to time to say hello. Solar energy and self sufficient cottage with some short hiking trails with amazing views just with a 5 min walk in your own backyard. Hope to come back to this little hidden gem
A great hideaway that feels close to nowhere. I enjoyed the stay  simple and rustic.
Great place to stay if you want to be immersed in nature. The views are phenomenal and the area is so quiet. We had an awesome stay and hope to return here sometime in the future.

First things first Thanks to Tarisai for beeing there and making everything work. Now... What can I say Surely the best airbnb I've ever been in. A nature's lovers paradise. The stunning view  the beautiful designed shack  the whole premises are breathtaking. Read all the positive reviews and expect exactly that. The place is completely off grid  runs with solar power  fresh water from the mountain  LPG gas for cooking and heating. And with Joel you'll have a host  who knows about the history of the place and can tell it. Also go for a hike in the backyards. View gets better with each step. If you're looking for a bigger house for more people  check out the second place on the same premises. Super beautiful  too.

What a magical place to stay at. Stunning position  magnificent views  friendly dogs  comfortable well-equipped kitchen. So close to the mountains and sea. We look forward to returning again.  Thank you so much for this fantastic experience.
What a wonderful stay. Clean  calm  and private  with places to walk. swim  and sit in paradise. The hosts were super welcoming and helpful. Definitely one to visit again.

Beauty surrounds this solar-powered  mountain-water-fed gem. If you like charting your day by the course of the sun  candelabras  cooking in house  and friendly dogs  this is the place. Attentive hosts with good recommendations. Possibly the best jumping off point for Cape Peninsula exploring other than staying in the Park. Highly Recommended.
Make sure your wake up for a sunrise  one of the best air b n bs i have stayed in Lovely place  easy check in
We had a great stay and the view is to die for
We loved our stay at Rosalind's. Feeling peaceful and away from it all but with easy access to Cape Town. We enjoyed walking up the mountain and the wonderful views. Would highly recommend.
Great location near Cape Point. Fantastic view of the whole of False Bay. Peace and quiet.

The cottage is in a nice  quiet location with both a mountain and sea view. While rustic  it adds to the experience to relax by candlelight. Tarisai is very helpful and was reachable at all times of day. The dogs are also adorable. We made quick friends. I would definitely choose to stay here again if I was in Simons Town.

We loved this little cottage. It had everything we needed en we loved the candle light evenings and the fireplace. The dogs were awesome and accompanied us on a short walk up the mountain. Lovely view of the ocean.  We will be back
Great place for a great breakaway. The views are amazing. No TV.... but who needs a TV when you're surrounded by such beauty. You are literally in the mountain . Great value for money.

Wow the most beautiful view in a lovely cabin on the mountainside. We loved the fireplace and candlelight and just being able to get back to nature. Wonderful hosts who even helped us with our bags such beautiful hospitality makes it extra special
Such a beautiful and unique spot. Wedged between the mountains and the ocean in a beautiful little stone cottage. It was lovely.
We had a really nice stay
Happy Place
Great stay in a very charming little house

The cottage was absolutely perfect for a relaxed couple of days. Tarisai was there to welcome us and explain everything. We enjoyed the surroundings and all the cozyness The place was beautifully decorated and had everything we needed. Thank you
A truly amazing place with beautiful surroundings - we found our stay here very relaxing and  the cabin was a lovely space. The dogs were also an added bonus
Absolutely awesome location  might be my favourite airbnb stay to date
We had an amazing stay From the beautiful interior to the mountain to the ocean views  everything was perfect. We loved the ecological focus  too. Wish we were staying longer
Idyllic location  the quirky cottage is thoughtfully designed to blend with the landscape to create a calming peaceful ambience. We loved it

The hut is very original en personal not luxurious but special. Located in sort of wild garden with great view and a feeling of freedom. It is off the grid so no load shedding issues. Kitchen has enough to make a meal and the bed sleeps well. I will definitely go back.
Nous avons pass un merveilleux sjour chez Rosalind

Absolutely fantastic place to start the new year in both a reflective and future-looking space. Quiet  nestled between the mountains and sea with spectacular views - and completely sustainable re energy. We met friendly dogs who guided us up and down the mountain. Tarisai  the caretaker  was very hospitable. Perfectly located to explore Cape Point and Simons Town.

We loved staying in this beautiful place between mountain and sea. Loved the simplicity and comfort  snorkeling andwalking on the mountain  the candle lit evenings  the reflection of the full moon on the sea. Thank you
Rosalinds huis ligt op een geweldige plek  en ademt zoveel romantiek uit. Ik kan het iedereen warm aanbevelen.

Rosalind place was a beautiful getaway on the road to Cape Point. The host was very welcoming and the people on the property were always very helpful. Would recommend it to anyone who appreciates nature.

Beautiful hideaway along the False Bay coast. The last property along the road and well hidden from all neighbours. Lovely trails around the mountain straight out the door. Very welcoming space Thanks for having us.
Great stay
Amazing  quiet and beautiful place Lovely dog trio
This is a very special cottage to relax and enjoy beautiful natural surroundings. I loved the views from every place in the house. It was quiet and peaceful and the host were friendly and helpful.
The most beautiful place I have ever been  felt so at home and absolutely loved with all my heart loved the hosts and staff. Will be coming back
Wonderful stay in a majestic location. Loved being off the grid and enjoying the splendor of the Cape. The cottage was perfect and had a lot of amazing touches. I hope to be back in the near future.

Rosalinds Property is just amazing. Located in the last stretch before Cape Point Nature Reserve you're sure to get some well deserved quietness from the ins and outs of city life. Rosalind and her husband took exceptional care of us. They provided everything we needed and more  while leaving us plenty of room for ourselves. Though we didn't have a car with us  most of the time we were able to get around the area without much trouble using uber. Some caution is definetly advised if you plan to do it in a similar way. The cottage itself is quiet a magical place  perfect for a romantic getaway. Due to the provision of power by solar energy loadshedding was not a problem and the internet worked perfectly. Though  you might not even want to use it as much once you're there. Don't miss out on a night on the adjacent patio since you'll be seeing a night sky difficult to beat. There's a high probability of catching a glimpse at the milky way and of more than a couple of shooting stars

Serenity and tranquility are what youll find here. Your cozy  private  modern cabin has a wonderful view of the bay  and it has all the amenities you could want to make you feel at home. I didnt even use electricity after dark  instead opting to read and relax by candlelight. Only a five minute drive from the entrance to Cape of Good Hope reserve  and less than 5 minutes from Simontown  it was a perfect place to stay if romantic isolation in beautiful surroundings is what you crave. Thanks also to Rosalind and company for an easy check in and relaxing experience. Her dogs were sweet
We had a lovely stay  thank you
We loved our stay at the cabin  beautiful views and incredibly cosy. Would happily go back again.

This is always a favourite place to go to find rest and quiet. It's set directly against the mountain  so nothing could be better. The hosts are exemplary too - they are great at communicating  make it really easy to get there  and their sustainable approach to living is an added bonus. Couldn't ask for more.
Perfect winter getaway with a lovely location and views
What a hidden gem Absolutely loved my stay. The property is so beautiful and hosts are fantastic and very responsive.
We loved our mini break - so close to the city  and yet it felt like a million miles away. Thank you
Wonderful and friendly host Falling asleep to the sound of the sea was nothing short of amazing
Responsive and helpful hosts on a beautifully re-wilded plot.

Amazing spot to get away from the hustle and bustle of city life. It was great to wake up and walk out your door with incredible sea views as well as mountain views  with walks up the mountain straight from the airbnb. The place was super cozy and had everything we needed and Joel's three dogs made the whole experience even better Can't wait to visit again
Had a really pleasant stay in this beautiful cottage nestled in the mountains. So peaceful
Felt right inside Hagrids cottageextremely comfy and cozy  beautiful sunset and sunrise  stunning mountain meets ocean view  private  morning greetings from the friendly dogs  natural sounds all day

We've had a lovely stay at the get away. The location is absolutely amazing and the house is great. Tarisai was very helpful and friendly with check-in. Two things to note First  there were three dogs constantly around the house and they tried to get in to the house too. Second  the wind can be very strong in the night  so even in summer it seems advisable to have some warm clothes for the evening and potentially ear plugs for the night because of the wind noise. That being said  we really enjoyed our two nights there and would wholeheartedly recommend.
My Partner and I really enjoyed our stay and i highly recommend this accommodation I like to highlight the cleanliness and the amazing view specifically Thank you
I have never been to heaven  but this place must be close or even better Heavenly will be back soon.. thank you
It was a very light-filled lovely little cottage  Thank you
Fabulous place in a stunning position on the edge of the ocean. Joel is a friendly and helpful host. Would go back in the blink of an eye

I booked this beautiful spot for my parents as an anniversary surprise and they absolutely loved it.  If you're looking for a peaceful getaway on the coast this is it It feels like you're somewhere on the garden route surrounded by trees and a view of the ocean. Everything was clean and exactly as described  if not better than described.
Lovely location and a great host.

Ce cottage est lun des endroits les plus incroyables que jai eu la chance de louer. Nous voyons tout de suite que Joel connat son sujet  quil a cr un logement en harmonie parfaite avec la nature et au Feng shui incroyable. Vu sur la mer et la montagne Que demande le peuple. Super emplacement pour aller au cap de bonne esprance  faire coucou au penguins et dcouvrir tous les endroits un peu cachs dont la rgion du cap regorge. Je recommande  100
This cottage is a great find. A beautiful  gem of a place that is perfect for a getaway.
We had a great time in the cottage. It's really cozy and comfortable and the location couldn't be better. Great to have the cute dogs around too We hope to come back one day.
Sjour super. Un vrai paradis
A unique and very beautiful place to stay. Watched the full moon rise over the ocean  with canine company. Thank you Joel and Taresai for making us so welcome.
Beautiful views with a mountain hike right out the back door and three friendly dogs eager to guide you safely up the mountain.

Wir hatten eine wunderschne Zeit und haben uns sehr wohl gefhlt. Ein ganz besonderer Ort in der Natur. Sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend sowie flexibel. Wir kommen bestimmt wieder. Vielen Dank fr alles

We experienced a very special  staycation as a couple before my boyfriend will be traveling extensively for work. Joel's mountain cottage was a idyllic hideaway to share these final moments and make it memorable.

We definitely enjoyed our stay at this airbnb. It is quite a different experience to common airbnbs as it is located in the nature. The views you will have are just amazing. When you lay in your bed you can hear the nature. Joel is a very friendly host and always makes sure you are doing great. We would definitely recommend this stay.

Joel is an incredibly pleasant person  always ready to offer help or great recommendations. His hospitality truly made my visit seamless. The place itself is stunning  nestled amidst breathtaking views and abundant nature. It's conveniently located near Boulders Beach and several other fantastic attractions. I look forward to visiting again

We had a wonderful time in Cape Town and part of that was due to how great the Airbnb was. It is in a great location  has a wonderful view  and exceeded our expectations. We appreciated how prompt James was with his responses and the accommodations you made for us. Thank you so much for providing us such a great experience

This was a spacious and clean apartment- we really enjoyed the wonderful views from the balconies. The location is a convenient distance from multiple attractions in Cape Town  and was situated in a popular area of the city. We would however  recommend using street smarts while out in the neighborhood and always use Ubertaxi  especially at night. For young women traveling alone  we felt safe within the apartment complex  which was a big priority for us
James was excelent  quick comunication  very kind and helpful always when I needed to solve something.
James is the most amazibg host I ever had. The appartment  the view  the location  everythings just perfect
Jamess place was perfect.  Clean  downtown location  secure.  We had a great time and would definitely stay here again.  Thanks James

James' apartment checked all the boxes - it is clean  situated in the city centre close to lots of tourist attractions and food joints and it is safe as the building is manned by security round the clock. Plus  you will be greeted with the amazing view of Table Mountain when you draw the curtains at the balcony. James was also very responsive to my queries and both my check-in and check-out was seamless. Thanks for the amazing experience  James You truly live up to your Superhost status

Weve loved the experience at James place The view is stunning The Place is very clean  beautiful  has all the facilities. We have absolutly nothing to complain The security and the service on the building are perfect too. Will recomend for sure
Very save and clean accommodation. Absolutele recommendation. TOP
Nice location in the down town Cape Town. James is responding quickly and offered late check-out. The appartment is clean  light and well equiped.
Great apartment in a central location. Checkin and out were really good. The stay as well. No problems everything went smooth.
Great location and James was very responsive to inquiries

My wife and I really enjoyed staying at Louise's flat  which is located in the heart of Kalk Bay  right across from the train station and within minutes of many cafes and restaurants. The flat itself is spacious  functional and tastefully decorated. Louise was a fantastic host - responsive  available and welcoming. Highly recommended.
100... Thank you very much

Staying in Whalehaven during our visit to Cape Town was an amazing experience. The apartment was well positioned to allow us to see and tour Kalk Bay and its surrounds as well as to access transportation to head into the city. The rooms were spacious and well looked after  the decor was exquisite and matched the areas incredibly and our hosts were more than gracious when tending to our miscellaneous needs.

This was my second stay at Louise's beautiful apartment in Kalk Bay and its as perfect as ever for a relaxing week for lovers of seafood and picture perfect scenery. Thanks again and I'll be back soon.

Louise's apartment is true to pictures  even better I would say. It was amazing to wake up everyday with this gorgeous seaview. The apartment has everything you need for a self-cattering accommodation  all furnishing and equipment are of quality. Also  it is very well located  plenty of cafe and restaurants in the street  and quaint little shops. The communication all along was smooth and easy. We had a great stay in Louise's apartment  I hope we can come back soon.

We have just returned from spending a week at Whalehaven  and have to say it was the best accommodation to have chosen. The location could not have been better  and with the bedrooms facing  the mountains it was very peaceful at night  and you wake up and have breakfast looking out to sea.  The apartment has everything you need and you feel very secure. Louise came over to say hello and check all was well  and when we couldn't work the TV someone came straight over to show us how it all worked.  Will definitely be returning and staying longer

Man knde sig vlkommen med en gng nr man visades runt i lgenheten. De var vldigt positiva  trevliga och tillmtesgende bde nr vi kom och nr vi lmnade lgenheten. Det fanns en folder med mycket bra information om omrdet. Lgenheten var fantastiskt fin med utsikt ver havet och hamnen. Precis s fin som bilderna visar. Fanns ven en liten uteplats med mjlighet till att grilla. Kan varmt rekommendera detta boende.

What a stunning little spot in Kalk Bay  within walking distance of restaurants  small amenity shops and even the Theatre.  The view from the lounge  dining room is just stunning not to mention the beautiful sunrise.  Thoroughly enjoyed our visit to Whalehaven.  Thank you to Louise and her team for making us feel so welcome.  We will definitely be back.
Great apartment with fantastic view. Highly recommended.
Perfectly located  well appointed and comfortable apartment in the centre of Kalk Bay.
Everything we needed it to be  Best Kalk Bay experience.  We'll go back.
Fabulous apartment in a great location. Our second stay in this lovely spot.

Louises place is beautiful and the location is GREAT  Well apointed clean and comfyhomely but stylish.  She is an excellent hostand takes care of all your needs. Well worth to stay at this lovely apartment.

What a cosy  beautiful decorated flat to stay in with the most wonderful perhaps the best view of the Sea and surroundings of Kalk Bay- Near to ALL the lovely restaurants that there are in Kalk Bay and all the cute little shops that one can visit. It was a GREAT pleasure staying there Thank you Louise for making your place so beautiful and for being such a lovely  friendly host The Crowthers
It comes very highly recommended. Fantastic views  great location and very helpful host. We'll be back soon
We enjoyed the time in that lovely apartment with the spectacular very much. It is a great place to stay and the apartment is very well equipped and organized.

James place is ideal for exploring Cape Town  central to many attractions and easy to get to others further afield. James recommendations are spot on also. He also responds very quickly and check incheck out was simple and fast. Highly recommended and will definitely stay again when I return to South Africa.
A very nice  stylish  well equipped  and clean apartment with a spectacular view. Close to everything. Great communication with James.

Great apartment in Cape Town. Check in process went smoothly  the building felt very secure  and we loved the amazing views of Table Mountain from the balcony. Would stay here again if we ever get back to Cape Town.
Stylish  safe and quiet apartment in great location in central Cape Town. James communicated very well at all times and would stay here again.

Die Wohnung hat einen guten Ausblick auf den Tafelberg. Das Appartement und die Parkgarage ist gut bewacht  die Hop on Haltestelle ist ca. 300Meter entfernt. Ein Spaziergang von der Long street zum Appartement ist bei Dunkelheit nicht zu empfehlen.
Amazing view  exactly as pictured. James was very responsive and we were granted a very late checkout without extra charge cause our flight took off late in the night - would highly recommend
The apartment has everything you could need  including great views of the hills.
Great position and great host. Thanks Louise
Wonderful  well located apartment. We had a great stay and would definitely be back
A beautiful stay with stunning views We loved out time in Kalk Bay and will definitely return
Perfectly located and a lovely spot to visit.  Close to wonderful restaurants and a walk away from quaint shops and coffee shops.  Definitely worth a visit.

What a beautiful space for a Winter getaway. Fabulous apartment  fireplace a treat in the cold and wet Cape Winter. Stunning views. Loads of beautiful restaurants to explore  little shops full of treasures  lovely walkways  whale watching.. I loved it The apartment is right in the center of Kalk Bay bustle. Will definitely be back. Thank you Louise
Perfect position  beautifully decorated. We loved staying here
Louise was so helpful the entire stay  making sure things went well like check-in and our time in Kalk Bay. The place is in an awesome location making it easy for us to explore the area
Wonderful apartment  Location was fantastic  Was homely and stunning views  Will definitely be back
The place is clean and nicely decorated. But if you're old heads up too many stairs. Location is very convenient  with lots of stores and restaurants.
We had a great stay at this wonderful apartment. Louise was also very responsive and helpful.

This airbnb was amazing  The location was perfect and allowed for easy access to an abundance of shops and restaurants.  It was beautifully decorated and comfortable.  Guy and Louise gave us a warm welcome and a detailed introduction to the area. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.  Highly recommend

We absolutely loved our stay in Louise's place. Being in the the heart of Kalk Bay  surrounded by shops and restaurants and across the road from the station  the position is unsurpassable. The apartment is beautifully renovated and tastefully and thoughtfully decorated  is light  bright and airy with huge sliding windows that open to an expansive view of the ocean on the other side of the road and is spotless  secure and completely comfortable - it  offered everything necessary for a short or long stay. Louise was a friendly  helpful  accessible and responsive host. She generously welcomed us with a  bottle of wine and  just before our departure  she popped in to say goodbye. We often go to Kalk Bay  which we love  but staying here added a wonderful new dimension to our experience of the area. We highly recommend this accommodation.
Really enjoyed our stay at Whalehaven.  Commanding azure blue ocean view take your breathe away. Highly recommended.
A lovely and well appointed apartment in beautiful Kalk Bay. The location is very central  and the view is gorgeous. Louise is a friendly and helpful host.
Fantastic property in a superb location. The hosts really made us feel welcome and couldnt have done any more for us. Highly recommend.
Amazing location  amazing everything

Really enjoyed the two day stay at Whalehaven. Louise was very friendly and helpful on arrival  and had no problem with check out later than usual on Sunday. Amazing views  and loved the wood stove for the chilly evenings while watching Netflix. Everything as promised  including being right in the hustle and bustle of Kalk Bay Main Rd.  But Whalehaven well insulated  and noise not a problem. Bedrooms especially quiet. Will be back

We spent a magical week in the flat with our 11 month old son. Everything we needed was provided for so it felt like a real holiday break. The flat has great self catering facilities and there are lots of places to buy meals. Our activities were limited because of COVID lockdown but the flat itself is a beautiful space to be in. The incredible view and position in the heart of Kalk Bay immerses one in the quaint village life with access to breathtaking dawn vistas over the ocean from the comfort of the living room.

The apartment was in an excellent location  close to shops and restaurants. It was clean with added extras  e.g coffee machine. Louise was a lovely host who was happy to answer any questions. Check-in and check-out was smooth and effortless. We will definitely be going back.

Whalehaven is a people-haven too We stayed for two nights but it felt like leaving home when it was time to go. From the view to the tastefully decorated space to the kitchen that has everything you need to the bed straight out of heaven to the BATHTUB straight out of heaven this place makes you want to stay forever. Louise was a brilliant host and made us feel at home right off the bat.

Delightful apartment  home away from home in the prettiest of harbor villages. Loved our stay  Louise is a wonderful host and her apartment is beautifully decorated and creates a warm and inviting space in which to enjoy all that Kalk Bay has to offer.
Our third stay in this wonderful apartment And we'll be back. Need I say more

Magnificent apartment in the heart of kalk bay. Would recommend this apartment if you are looking for a great place to stay in kalk bay. The views of the ocean were absolutely stunning and we loved being right in the middle of the kalk bay vibe. Our bed was super comfortable and we slept so well   Thanks Louise

Wow You couldnt get a better location than this  you could just sit at the window everyday and admire the view of watch the people meander on by in the hustle and bustle of Kalk Bay. Louise was a fantastic host and made us feel very welcome and she was quick to respond to any questions. I cannot wait to head back to Kalk Bay - to our home away from home. Couldnt recommend this enough
My stay was acceptable.
The location is great. You are in the heart of Kalk Bay  everything is an easy walk. Place is very secure  has everything for a great stay
Lovely to be in the center of Kalk Bay and Louise is a great host who accommodated our booking changes thoughtfully.
Stunning apartment and amazing location - highly recommended

Excellent location tonight off the main road lends itself to walking to all restaurants and cafes. Waking up to views of the ocean were soulful. The apartment is beautifully decorated and it felt like home from home.
Louise was very accommodating with the request for a baby cot. Instructions given for check in was very clear and easy.
I booked this lovely place for my brother and his girlfriend. They had the best time Great location and a very comfortable stay The host is also very friendly and accommodating.

We had an amazing2 day stay at Whalehaven.  Everything was just great  the view mesmerising and the hub of Kalk Bay Village right on your doorstep  great restaurants a short walk away. The Double glazed windows shut out any noise and we had a fabulous sleep in beautiful linen and comfy beds.  Definitely will go back there.  Thank you Louiseand Guy
Louise's place is a gem Fantastic location  safe  and high quality linen and finishes. We can't wait to visit again.
We had a great stay Perfect location and the view was spectacular. The option of being able to leave our bags with security  was a major perk

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in this well decorated and very well positioned top floor apartment although it rained a couple of days.  The fire place kept us warm and the large windows gave us the opportunity to enjoy watching the ocean while it rained. A true gem of a place. We hope to return soon.

This is a wonderful flat in a great location. It's comfortable  stylish  and well-equipped. It does face a main road across from a popular restaurant  so there's some street noise in the lounge but the bedrooms are quiet. Communication with the host was efficient and she was really helpful in meeting our needs. Highly recommended

Louise's place is exactly what you need when coming to Kalk Bay. A beautiful  open  airy and thoughtfully kitted out spot to have a coffee and croissant in the morning before you cross the road  dip in the tidal pool and wander about the town  or a glass of wine in front of the fireplace in the evening after a day on the beach or spent sightseeing. Louise and her husband are wonderful and gracious hosts and I couldn't recommend their place highly enough.

Dont think twice - book Louises place. It is just perfect. With its European feel  the unspoilt view over False Bay and the vibey feel of Kalk Bay  its just the place to book if you want to go on the coastal walk to Muizenberg or browse the many quiant shops in Kalk Bay.
Fantastic place to stay. Louise was incredibly accommodating even when the internet went out. Lovely experience and would definitely come back
Beautiful secure place with a lovely sea view.
Beautiful apartment in a perfect location Check in and out was easy  lovely host  amazing apartment. Would definitely stay again

A perfectly located and well equipped apartment.. comfortable and perfect for any special occasion. We spent Christmas in this lovely space and were truly treated to an amazing location and comfortable stay Cant wait to return
Very central to stay but it is a bit noisy being on the main road and opposite the restaurant. we had a lovely time
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay The apartment had incredible views of the ocean and the mountain. Louise was an incredible host Will be returning
Lovely place - very clean and beautiful view

Fabulous  spacious  uncluttered flat with beautiful l views  perfect for my son and me  we could go off and do separate things. Nice restaurants locally  and we loved the tidal pools nearby. Highly recommended

Louises place is in an excellent location and is a very stylish and tidy apartment. We had a great long weekend and were able to enjoy all the restaurants and amenities that were within walking distance. Is a great place for couples looking to enjoy a long weekend with no need for a car
Fantastic accommodation and ideally positioned

This was a beautiful apartment right in the heart of Kalk Bay. Gorgeous views of the ocean and easy access to fabulous shops  restaurants and cafes - and to the beach Louise was a super helpful host. Highly recommended

A view to die for. This is a fantastic flat. The large windows slide fully open.  The outlook is off the scale fantastic  especially for a lover of funky Kalk Bay. You feel part of the action  but with the bedrooms on the back you still get a good nights sleep.  We felt safe. The little balcony at the back was lovely too.  We look forward to our next visit.

Such a lovely  homely place right in the centre of Kalk Bay with stunning views. The beds were super comfortable and the living space felt wonderful to be in. We will definitely be back Louise was super quick to respond and accommodating to our requests. Thanks again
The stay in Kalk Bay was a present for my mother who said Beautiful place  beautiful view. So sad to leave. Hope to be back one day. Which seemed like the sort of feedback I should share.
Lovely home  great hosts and beautiful view Thanks

I booked this stay for my mom in law and her family. They absolutely loved it. The location is FANTASTIC. One has to simply walk a few steps out of the apartment block and you are in the hub of beautiful Kalk Bay. Lots of restaurants  shopping and entertainment at your doorstep. The hosts were particularly kind and friendly.  They went out of their way to keep in touch and made check in and checkout effortless. I really appreciated this about the listing. Will be back soon.
A great spot that couldn't be better located

The apartment is in the perfect location right in the heart of Kalk Bay with spectacular views overlooking the ocean. It is immaculately clean and has luxurious bedding  hight quality appliances. We often visit Kalk Bay and have found our favorite accommodation.
An amazing gem with perfect location.
We loved the view over the water  the open florplan and the convenience of everything in Kalk Bay. We hope to return
Our 4th stay at this wonderful spot. And well be back.
Lovely place  perfect location  highly recommended.

Perfect location for exploring Kalk Bay  tide pools  restaurants and harbor in east walking distance.  Beds were very comfy and kitchen stocked with the essentials.  The view over both mountains and ocean is lovely.
A perfect spot to be away from the chaos of city center but close to all the hidden gems that Kalk Bay has to offer  There is so much to see and do in the area that one doesnt even need to leave
We absolutely loved Louises apartment in Kalk Bay. The location is perfect and her home is absolutely gorgeous. Louise was also great with communicating. We would most definitely stay there again.

The position could not be better in Kalk Bay. Short walking  distance to everything you needed - bars  restaurants  cafes  boutique shops  ocean pools etc etc etc. We thoroughly recommend this beautiful apartment. The hosts were super friendly and easy to deal with and provided everything that we required for our 7 day stay.

We so enjoyed our stay  what a beautiful little apartment  fabulous views and location. Very stylishly decorated. We just needed to go downstairs to enjoy local cafes restaurants etc yet it was not at all noisy. Would love to return.

Louise and Guy were incredibly welcoming hosts. They were also very helpful in our family's emergency situation. Everything we needed for our young baby was also available. Location is literally a few chin-whiskers away from the ocean. Walking distance to some of the best eating in Cape Town. The house was spotless. Bedding and linen incredibly comfortable. It was in the heart of it all without being noisy and overwhelming. We would highly recommend and definitely return. Thank you to Louise and Guy. 1010.

Hands down the best Airbnb weve ever stayed at. It felt like home  it had the best view and being in the heart of Kalk Bay could not have a better location to explore the False  Bay Area. Truly an amazing stay and felt very welcome by Guy and Louise

This place was amazing It was clean  extremely comfortable and an awesome location right next to tons of restaurants and shops. We loved waking up in the morning and watching the sunrise over the bay. I cant say enough good things about this lovely Airbnb I would highly recommend it

Parking was a little difficult  but other than that this place was perfect. Stunning views  immaculate and thoughtful decor. They have really thought of everything to make your stay a comfortable one. Thank you so much  we hope to return soon

Louises place was fantastic. Very clean and stylish place with everything you needed. In a great location  right near heaps of great places to eat Louise was very accommodating and helpful letting us checking in on us regularly to make sure we had everything we needed and check out a little later than usual. I am definitely stay here again
We can highly recommend Whalehaven We enjoyed everything about it and would love to return. thank you
I had a fantastic stay. The place was absolutely beautiful and in a perfect location for exploring restaurants and locations. I would definitely come again
Really loved my stay. even thought its in the heart of town this sweet place was quiet. Loved the tidal swimming pools a block away and many good restaurants. Would be a place I'd come back to

There were three of us in the apartment and we felt very comfortable. The view of the sea from the large window is beautiful. The house is on the main road  so it is relatively noisy from the traffic when the window is open. But even that was perfectly fine for us  especially since the bedrooms are on the other side of the flat and there was complete silence. We enjoyed the apartment and the hospitality of Louise and Kalk Bay very much and can only recommend the apartment and the place.
We had a great stay..clean  everything you need..walking to shops a bonus. Lovely view of Kalkbay. modern apartment.
We spent a couple of days at Louise's place at it has been all very cosy and nice. The apartment seems a little smaller than in the pictures but the view from the living room is truly astonishing.
Lovely space with great views. Everything as described and Louise was very responsive and helpful

It is a great location and the recent remodel makes the property like new. There are many fantastic restaurants within 1-5 minutes walk and the ocean views are stunning. Very nice place and my wife and I loved it and would recommend it highly to anyone. Louise was a great host and helped make our stay a great experience.
Beautiful apartment with breathtaking views  we loved every minute of it
Dont stay stay here if you need electricity for remote work  a hot shower  or medical reasons.

Very comfortable flat with wonderful views of False Bay.  Local restaurants were very enjoyed  especially the Salt and Harbour House. Louise and her husband accommodated our requests and were super helpful when I was feeling ill.  The wood stove kept the winter chill at bay.  I would stay again and highly recommend.
Our fifth stay in this wonderful apartment. Considered  comfortable interior and a perfect location. We will be back

I spent two extremely cold weeks at Whalehaven  but the wood stove worked great and made it bearable.  Excellent views of False Bay and Kalk Bay Harbor  and a very busy street scene below. Kitchen is large and well appointed although I never cooked once and only made coffee.  Many very good restaurants nearby and a functional train to get to Muizenburg or Fish Hoek if you like. There is definitely quite a bit of noise from the Main Road  but with the windows closed  it's definitely bearable.  Nights are peaceful and the bed was comfortable and there was plenty of storage.  You can open the doors to the back porch from the master bedroom and sit at the table and have your coffee in the morning or a sundowner in the evening.   There was quite a bit of rain when I was there and I could hear the frogs on the mountain while in bed and the calls from the local mosque at dusk  which all seemed kind of magical.  Definitely  recommend.

Absolutely fantastic apartment with views to die for. Very homely feel. We felt much safer than we expected to. The people in the area are so friendly. Fab restaurants nearby. Dont miss Bobs coffee shop and Satori for food. We will definitely visit this apartment again. Outstanding. And Louise is a great host. Very quick to respond.
Locatie is super  direct aan de boulevard  alles beloopbaar. uitzicht op de basis  zelfs dolfijnen gesport. Staat ook een kijker in de kamer zodat je ver op ze kunt kijken.

Louises place is impeccable. Well designed and comfortable. Right in the middle of the quirkiness of Kalk Bay. We were there on Easter weekend and had quite a few engagements. Parking was a little difficult  but we always managed within a block or two. Last time I felt this vibe was in Venice. Here the view was just better You make me proud to be a South African  Louise
Wonderful place with gorgeous views Very nice responsive host.

Walhaven is serene and beautiful in the heart of Kalk Bay. The views are magical. The music wafting up from the street musicians last night as the sun set was the cherry on the cake. The bedrooms are at the back of the apartment with a view to the mountain and there is a lovely porch infront of them that catches the morning sun. The best Airbnb I have stayed in to date and I hope to stay there again in future. Ingrid

Modern  well-appointed apartment with stunning balcony views in high rise block in convenient town centre location. Surprisingly quiet given the location  thanks I suppose to being ten floors up. Access easy and secure. Apartment is in decent used condition  rather than immaculate
A beautiful flat with a beautiful view. Pool especially is a great touch you wont feel like youre in the CBD once you get up to the apartment area. Great stay and a fantastic host
Perfect view of Table Mountain  very good and central location. We felt very safe at all times.
had an amazing time and will definitely be back

Everything about James place was perfect - the view  location  safety  friendly building staff  fast communication Only small complaint is the parking is all the way at the top of a tall parking lot  but it is very safe. I would  recommend this place to any group of 2 people.
Great view of the city and the mountain  excellent location Dont miss it
Great place and very well located.

The apartment is amazing. Great view  super clean  a lot of extra accomodations. The communication with the host was quick  clear and friendly. The location of the airbnb was great and the security very nice to have.

Indeed this was an apartment with spectacular views. I can highly recommend it to any who considers staying in Capetown for a short while. Nicky  Bryan are simply the best hosts I have ever met. Its very close to the city center  but perfectly located in green point.
Incredible flat  with an awesome view over Capetown Waterside Had an awesome time and Nicky and her boyfriend were absolutely great and uncomplicated. Much appreciated

Nicky's place was beautiful  just as the pictures show It was super clean  comfortable and had everything I needed.  NIcky was very helpful  friendly  and available if something came up.  Great stay in Cape Town Highly recommended.

I cannot say enough wonderful things about Nicky and Bryan and their spectacular apartment with breathtaking views.  The apt is immaculate and beautifully decorated  clean  organized  and luxurious.  The views will spoil you  unless of course Nicky and Bryan get to you first.  Fresh roses greeted me on the dining room table  and housekeeping greeted me twice a week with laundry service to boot  Seriously  Nicky and Bryan are the most warm  generous  fabulous hosts and will be lifelong friends.  I was lucky to have found this gem  and won the lottery on meeting them.  Cheers

We are a family of 11 from Ireland  England and Australia  who stayed at Taronga Villa over Christmas and new year. From start to finish we were made to feel very welcome. Our host Linda was very quick with communication and we were met by her lovely staff who made our stay very pleasant. No request was a problem. The house was kept very clean and tidy for us which we much appreciated  the villa is situated in the most central area  which makes visiting all the must see places so easy. We had a fabulous time and would have no hesitation in recommending Taronga Villa to anyone. We requested late check out re late flights and was granted that no problem. We would again like to thank all at Taronga Villa.
Every thing was great

Seven of my out of town guests enjoyed 18 days in Linda's villa. The Villa is a beautiful  hospitable space. It is well equipped. Linda was easy to work with and very accommodating of our special requests. My friends enjoyed both the house and the grounds as well as the beautiful surroundings.
Erg aardig. Huis werd dagelijks schoon gemaakt. Locatie goed en fijn dat er voor de kinderen een hek rondom het zwembad geplaatst kon worden.

Linda is a wonderful host who made us feel welcome from the very first communication. Her home is just gorgeous and set in such a beautiful peaceful garden  close to excellent restaurants  shops and of course the beautiful Constantia wine estates. The house comes equipped with absolutely everything you need. It was the most perfect setting for four generations of our family to meet up and enjoy a special time together.

Fantastic location. Very clean  cosy  quiet. 200 satisfied. It is like at home. MadeleineWarren are so friendly. On tait comme a la maison dans cette appartement de charme en bord de mer. L'accueil tait remarquable.

Madeleine was very welcoming  friendly and helpful. We found the accommodation so comfortable - it was also very safe  clean and well equipped.  We loved our stay and the location was ideal for our requirements. If we came back to Bloubergstrand we will not hesitate to stay here again. Thank you Madeleine and Warren

Safe and secure flat with good facilities and a great place to make a base to travel around Cape Town. Car parking  whilst high up in the multi-storey is close to a lift direct to the floor the flat is on. Really enjoyed our stay.

We stayed for a few days and enjoyed the whole experience. The rooms are very cozy and clean. We have our own private entry and parking. The location is spectacular as a walking distance to the beach at Big Bay Our hosts are very friendly and helpful. We highly recommend this place
Perfect

Big Bay is an excellent locality out of the city with convenient access to the beach and quiet surrounds.  Madeleine was truly hospitable and generous in sharing her knowledge of the area. Our stay at La Paloma was comfortable. Thanks Madeleine
Recommended to eveyone that wants a quite peaceful rest and great beaches.
Great accommodation with great hospitality from the host. Would definitely recommend if youre looking for accommodation in the area
I love to stay there
I stayed one night at Madeleines place. Great place. Can only recommend
Great stay  perfect for what we needed
We absolutely loved every moment of our stay. Amazing host and beautiful accommodation.
Very friendly and helpful host.
The apartment was perfect for what I was looking for in terms of location space and facilities. James is a brilliant host - so responsive and helpful - couldnt have asked for more.
It is a nice  clean and very safe place to stay. Well equipped. All you need is available. Also a busstop groote kerk in front of the building.

Really spacious apartment with incredible views of table mountain just like in the photos. I appreciated the amenities as well  with the fridge stocked with some breakfast items  coffee and tea  and a washing machine. As others mentioned  parking is pretty far up the building  but not difficult to navigate. It took me about four minutes to go up or down.

Brilliant space and location - highly recommend Close to everything in central Cape Town  light  airy apartment with spectacular views of Table Mountain and in a well equipped apartment building. James was also proactive in communicating which is really helpful - thanks James
good very recommend

The actual place is better than the pictures. A great situated apartment with nice touches of providing anything you might need in your stay. I really appreciated all the little touches  staff were super nice around the apartment  and the view was quite spectacular. Overall  great stay  thanks

Everything about my stay was perfect. The apartment was bright  spotless  and well-equipped location amazing  and safety top notch. James was clear and quickly available in all communication. I will definitely return.
We really enjoyed our stay  convenient location and amazing views
Great place at a central location. James was awesome and he replied fast to my messages. Definitely recommend it
had a wonderful stay in Cape Town Loved the view  apartment set up and the location. Highly recommend

Amazing spot in the middle of Cape Town with a perfect balcony view of Table Mountain. Place had everything we needed for our 10 day stay. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Would definitely book this place again.
Great location with stunning views.
Wohnung sehr zentral gelegen und sehr sicher.
A lovely apartment with amazing views of the city Was a great base for exploring Cape Town  and we felt very safe.

Wir waren bereits zum zweiten Mal in der Unterkunft von James. Seit dem letzten Jahr hat James einige Neuerungen in der Wohnung. Es gibt jetzt eine effektive Verdunklung im Schlafzimmer  ein neues Bett und eine neue Aufteilung der Sitzecke. Whrend unseres Aufenthaltes wurde der Khlschrank gegen ein neues  absolut leises Modell ausgetauscht. Zudem kamen zwei Sonnensthle  die die Nutzung des oberen Balkons perfekt machen. Die Lage der Wohnung ist einzigartig. Man kann von hier fast jeden Punkt zu Fu erreichen  was insbesondere durch die verstrkten Sicherheitsmanahmen in der Stadt ein Vergngen ist. Auch die Sicherheit innerhalb des Gebudes ist perfekt. James ist ein perfekter Gastgeber. Wir hatten wunderschne Wochen- und kommen bald wieder

Louise defensietop made Sure I had a lovely stay in Capetown. As most of the time as was in my own  I felt a little insecure in the beginning. But Louise Bongi and Elizabeth made me feel very safe and welcome. The apartment is great. It has a real home vibe. And Louise's style is great The place was kept very clean and tidy and the location was amazing with 1 block from the beach and walking distance to many great coffee places  gyms and restaurants. I'm definitely staying here again

Even though Louise was working on the day we arrived she made sure she was there to welcome us and show us what was what in the apartment.  She had made an information folder containing  helpful tips on what to do and where to go and even provided prepaid bus tickets.
Great Location  with hassle free communication between Louise and myself. Lovely apartment and well maintained welcoming pool and secure parking.

This was our second stay in Louise's beautiful apartment which is comfortable and very stylish. Such a great location especially for morning walks along the sea front. Louise is such a fantastic host making you feel very welcome and always at the end of a phone for any advice or issues.

Louise was an amazing host  everything was all ready for our arrival and she was available to sort out a problem for us immediately. The apartment was fantastic  beautifully decorated and had everything you would need for a comfortable stay. The location is very convenient for living on the Atlantic seaboard
