Lovely place  we stay 1 month there and we loved having our place right near to everything Joy has good taste and you have everything you need there. Only the shower may be low on water some times. Otherwise everything is perfect. If you go to Capetown  I highly recommend this little jewelry

We spent approx a month in Joy's house and had a wonderful time. The house is very charming and light and it's everything there  you need for a nice stay. The property itself has a nice garden and as it's located on a little hill  the view is amazing. Also we felt safe all the time. On the property there is the house and three more apartments. The other people were very nice and we experienced good vibes in our little neighbourhood. Also the two lovely dogs contributed their share. A good supermarket is in walking distance. The popular Bree Street is nearby. Many thanks again
Amazing view Very comfortable apartment. Would love to come back

Highly recommended This is a little great Anthropologie-style apartment in the heart of Green Point. Pictures don't make it justice. Lots of nice details. Position is perfect--you can walk to Green Point park  to great restaurants and deli  to VA  to the Sea Point promenade. You can also catch cabs right outside the door. The only thing--I wouldn't necessarily recommend it if you have a 2yo because there are a lot of things that could break. I also wouldn't necessarily recommend it if you are planning to cook a lot because there is not a real dining table more of a breakfast table. Recommended in all other cases  it is perfect.
Amazing and very clean appartment Just positive memories

Die Wohnung ist direkt am Greenmarket Square. Beste Lage Schlafzimmer ist nach hinten raus und ruhig Der Balkon bietet eine ideale Aussicht. Die Ausstattung ist hervorragend. Wir wurden sogar vom Flughafen abgeholt Fazit toller Gastgeber  tolle Wohnung Absolut empfehlenswert

We had quite a lovely stay at Connell's place. It is perfectly located in the market square  which is super accessible for tourists. Plenty to do  see  eat and buy in the market below. Cape Town over all was stunning  and Connell was very hospitable. He picked us up from the airport  told us about the city and much more and was very friendly. We'll certainly be back

Connell met us at the house to get us settled in. He is very hospitable and was a pleasure to meet. The house is close to many restaurants. It is very close  2-3 min walk  to one of the hop onoff bus stops and office. The only downside is the wifi slowed down considerably in the evening but I would not hesitate to stay here again.
Amazing host and space I highly recommend.
Connell was very helpful and quick to respond. The location of his suite was great and we had a wonderful stay exploring the city. Highly recommend
Great place  great host  great location. The only thing that was missing was strong internet.
hopefully  after Connell reads review he will fix and update info on accommodation.

The place is located in the very heart of the city centre  safeguarded and Connell is very responsive. It is generally a good value for money  however  the place is exposed to quite some noise coming from Green Market to the kitchen and the inner hall to the bedroom  internet is not reliable and when it's cold outside the apartment is freezing. We were also unlucky as the entire front of the building was covered with scaffolding due to some works of which we got to know upon arrival and the washing machine didn't work.

Location couldn't be better  absolutely central for Cape Town city centre  comfortable walking distance for all the city centre sights. Previous reviews had mentioned poor internet speeds   Connell himself warned me of it  but I had no problem at all with it. The flat is small  but nicely furnished  the bedroom  bathroom were spotless. The only problem was that the entire building was shrouded in scaffolding as it was being cleaned  having structural repairs done. This meant the little balcony couldn't be used  the view over Greenmarket Square was almost completely obscured  the kitchen  which the balcony opens on to  had an inescapable layer of fine  gritty dust from the work taking place outside. I had to make sure the curtains were drawn at night  not opened in the morning until I was fully dressed as there were occasionally workmen walking past - not a problem I'd expected on the 4th floor  I can't say it especially spoiled my stay  but it was disappointing I'd looked forward to sitting looking at the world below me from the balcony.

We are seniors and we appreciated how gracious and thought Connell was as her provided transportation from the airport to his place and gave us great help in getting around Cape Town. His place is clean  well equipped and centrally located on the interesting Green Market Square. This provided an ideal location for discovering Cape Town.
Everything was as described. Connell is a great host and the communication went very well and fast. I will come again

Connell did everything to make our stay comfortable. We didnt know where to park so he just came down to guide us through the streets. The location is really in the center of Cape Town with many restaurants and bars in walking distance. We would definitely recommend this place to explore the city

Connells apartment is great. Very clean  great location. There is a really nice craft market just outside Connell was very thoughtful and waited for us in the apartment even when our flight was delayed. I strongly recommend you to stay here.

After the first three days in CT  I have choosen Connells apartment for a second time  for another three days. Everything was fantastic  he also picked me up from the airport and dropped me back. A great host for a stay in the CT city center. Thanks Connell  I will come back
connell is a very nice host which whom it is very easy to talk  he is helpfull and the appartment is very clean and well situated. we warmly recommand
The flat is very well located in a vibrant part of Cape Town. I will stay again
Very nice stay  thanks

We loved our 5 days at the apartment and would love to have stayed longer Its great to be on the balcony overlooking the hustle and bustle of Greenmarket Square  being right in the heart of the city. The free walking tours from the Motherland Cafe just round the corner  are brilliant the hop on and off bus is just across the square and a brilliant way to see the city and to get to Table Mountain. The Food Lovers Market  on the square  sells delicious and cheap food to eat back in the apartment. Connell is a fantastic host too. Really recommended to embrace city life

We had a great time in Capetown thanks to Connells flat location which is just PERFECT You are in the heart of the town which is very handy because everything  you need is in walking distance. The flat is very nice with a balcony overlooking the Green Market Place and very well equipped and clean. We had a problem with the WiFi and Connell came to help immediately. He even brought us a telephone so that we could call home and tell them we had arrived safely in Capetown Connell is a very friendly and outgoing person who knows a lot about the town history. So dont miss that go to Market Place you cant find a better place
Great place to stay Connell is a wonderful host. Apartment is clean and neat  centrally located  with food  transport and shopping right out the front door of the building.
Great value for money in a very central location.
Great place with excellent location

We had a very nice stay at Connell's place It is the perfect location  right in the city center with all the shops and Long Street just around the corner. We felt very safe there are security guys. The apartment is clean and well equipped. The bedroom is spacious and and we slept very well - depending how sensitive you are with noise  it can be a bit louder in the morning with Green Market Square just out front  but when you close all doors it is not a problem at all. Connell is very friendly and open-minded and we would definitely recommend staying at his place
apartamento bien ubicado. un poco de ruido a las 6 AM por el mercado  toca madrugar

A better place to stay in Cape Town I wouldnt know of one. Right in the middle of the city. On a nice square. Always things to see from your nice balcony. Save  with a 247 watch at the door. The Apartment has all you need. The bedroom windows look at stairway but this is no problem. Connell is very friendly  he met me at the AirPort late in the evening against a very reasonable cost. His good morning message  next morning  was that extra touch that makes a person happy. The car I rented later on was savely stored at the parking right around the corner. All in all  highly recommended

The stay at Connell's flat couldn't have been any better. The flat is conveniently located right in the middle of City Centre so that many sights are in walking distance. Although the busy and sometimes noisy Greenmarket Square is right in front of it  the bedroom is nice and quiet as it lays backwards. Communication with Connell was also super easy. To recommend
Nice location and great appartment.
Kat greeted us with a beautiful bright smile and warm hug. We felt comfortable immediately. She gave us a quick tour of her apartment  made sure we had all we needed. Street parking was super easy.

Kat's home was the perfect stop-gap for my initial stay in Cape Town before I found something more permanent. The flat is fully furnished and included everything I needed for a comfortable end enjoyable stay in a vibrant area.

the apartment is just as described. location is super we always felt secure not only in the apartment  but also on the street infront of it. very nice location do travel around cape town. can highly recommend this place

We had a great stay at Kat's home in the Cape. It is very spacious  light and comfortable it is decorated with great taste and equipped with all that is needed for a confortable stay. The appartment complex is very well located within short distance of the Waterfront area and within walking distance of several shopping and dining options. We would stay there with great pleasure on our next visit.

The location of the flat was absolutely perfect  close to many restaurants  across green park  with great playgrounds for our kids  in walking distance from waterfront and the Sea Point promenade  exactly what we were looking for. The flat is situated in a quiet complex with little gardens  which was nice. I was a bit worried that our 18 month would find plenty of things to break in the flat but it was ok. The table with high stools are not easy with children  especially a toddler - but w could have guessed it from the pictures.

Kat's place is adorable and we loved calling it home during our time in Capetown. The location is great  walking distance to VA waterfront  a Spar grocery store and other shops and restaurants. The decorations are lovely and the patio and garden area are so nice to relax...plus the couch is so comfy Check-in and out were super easy and Rita the house manager was so accommodating for us. Thank you
Amazing stay with an even better hospitality
Esta muy bien ubicado se puede ir caminando a algunos lugares.El departamento impecable y sper cmodo. 10 puntos todo
Excelente Vale muito a pena Me senti em casa Localizao privilegiada Realidade melhor que o anncio Anfitrio solcito
Great location Great hospitality
The place was great very clean and convenient spot. There is a security guard downstairs and the place is super safe.
Apartamento com excelente espao para um casal  limpo e organizado. A localizao  bem no centro da cidade   nos permitiu fazer vrios passeios a p.

Great location at city center within 15 mins walk or an easy Uber to most major attractions. Please note that the apartment faces a square where market vendors will start their setup at 6am onwards  and that the bedroom is adjacent to a fire escape where people sometime smoke. At the time we stayed  there were refugees camping out at the adjacent street where the UN HQ was located. Cape Town is a great city
Super Lage  sauber und unkompliziert. Gerne wieder.

Great location. A block way from the Baz Bus office which does an excellent Cape Peninsula tour  2 blocks from the hop on hop off bus which goes to all the major places in town and right next to dozens of restaurants  tour companies and shopping. I was a female traveling alone and felt perfectly safe but it is the side of town that many caution not to go out at night  which I didnt. If youre looking for a safe  comfortable and convenient  home base while you run around town but dont like the idea of staying in a hostel  stay at Connells place. Also  pay the small amount of extra money and arrange pick up and drop off from the airport with Connell  hes great company and will give lots of tips and answer any questions.
Very nice
Great place. Connell made sure we felt at home and ensured the place was spotless prior to our arrival.

Die Wohnung ist wirklich wundervoll zentral. Man kann viele Sehenswrdigkeiten zu Fu erreichen. Gut auch fr Nachtschwrmer. In unmittelbarer Umgebung gibt es viele Restaurants und Bars. Leider aber wird der tgliche Markt morgens auf und abends abgebaut  was doch recht laut ist. Die Wohnung ist gerumig mit einer schnen Wohnkche und tollem Blick auf die Stadt. Aber leider hat das Schlafzimmer nur ein Fenster zum innenliegenden Treppenhaus und somit keine Frischluftzufuhr. Der Kontakt zum Vermieter war sehr nett.
Great place to stay
luogo perfetto per chi vuole visitare cape town  si  vicini praticamente a tutti i luoghi di interesse Connel  una persona gentile e simpatica raccomando questo posto....
Connell is one of the best host Ive ever met in airbnb Love his place located in heart of CBD and well definitely be back next time

The location is very good in terms of convenience. The city sightseeing double decker bus great value for the cost has a stop right on the next corner  and there are several places to grab a quick coffee  and excellent dine-in options nearby. Its also a good apartment if you plan to cook  as hes left it fully equipped and theres a grocery nearby. Waterfront is a quick cheap Uber ride dont use taxis. Apartment is very clean and Connell met me at the airport  and dropped me back to the airport despite an early flight. He really wants to make sure you feel welcomed and is invested in you being happy with your experience.

Buena ubicacin sobre todo si te gusta la artesana  en uber te puedes mover por todos lados sin problema. Si la primera noche no sabiamos como se ponia el sector cuando se oscureci y pasamos un poco de susto buscando un negocio para comprar algo que comer. Muy oscuro  gente vive alrededor de green market en la calle.  Connell muy preocupado de todo  muchas gracias

I'm really glad that I booked with Connell. It's not often that you meet a person as friendly and caring as Connell. His apartment is also quite good  except for the fact that the windows in the bedroom show into the apartment. So it is not possible to air out. Nevertheless  the apartment is equipped with everything you need. I had a very good stay and I would book again with Connell.
Beautiful place with a balcony overlooking the market square...perfect for morning coffee or sundowners

Loved  loved  loved our stay at Market House. Market house is right on Greenmarket Square which is a historical sight in the centre of old Cape Town  SA. Market House is a beautiful Art Deco building and walking distance from Cape Town's best museums  art galleries and manu attractions. The 24 hour doorman security guard makes one feel 100 safe. All should experience the energy and cultural inspiration of the Cape Town city centre and cultural hub at least once in their lifetime.  Thank you to Mr Connell Davids who was the perfect host - not only providing us with a lovely place to stay which was great value for money because it had everything one could possibly need washer  dryer  hair dryer  iron  ironing board... anything you would have at your house and even luxuries but he also gave us advice and guidance as he is a highly knowledgeable man who knows his city and its its history. Truly an inspiration area to stay in.
I highly recommend staying here. A real hands-on host experience  great communication and you feel well taken care of. 5 stars almost feels insufficient.

We really enjoyed our stay at the Market house. Everything is within walking distance  and all the facilities in the apartment work well good wifi  nice shower etc. Communication with Connell was also quick and pleasant  and we could book on very short notice. There can be some noise from the square  but this always ended before we wanted to sleep.

Connell is a wonderful host who is hands on and easily contactable. He always had great tips on where to go and places to see. The apartment is neat and  cosy  as well as  centrally located close to restaurants and shops perfect for our needs. An added bonus was the performances in the market square that we could enjoy from the balcony. The music and bustling city adds to the atmosphere. A wonderful stay all-round. Definitely recommend a stay here.
A great place with friendly but not too friendly  host

Very nice and central place to stay in the hub of Cape Town  shops is around every corner I would literally suggest onced  checked in to first explore the area on foot  the Sqaure have security around the clock nice and spacious apartment  had a lovely stay.

The unit was clean and is close to some  the popular tourist area. The host also waited till night to help me with check-in since my flight arrived at night time. However the unit did not have airconditioning as was advertised prior to my booking. The host was upset that I had made a claim concerning this issue.
great host  amazing location  willbe returning
good location at the market Square  comfortable and very friendly host

Cozy apartment with a beautiful view in the heart of Cape Town. Couldnt ask for a better location. Only a minute walk to the hop-on-hop-off bus officestop. Connell was also super knowledgeable and helpful. Will be coming back

Departamento con excelente ubicacin  cerca de varios museos y del bus turstico de la ciudad. Durante el da la zona es pintoresca  con el mercado a pocos metros  y muy transitada. De noche hay menos movimiento y no es idea para ir a pasear. La atencin del dueo  Connell  fu excelente  siempre al tanto de nuestras necesidades. Altamente recomendable.
Cet appartement est trs bien situ  nous avons pu faire beaucoup de choses puisque nous sommes situs en centre-ville la vue est trs belle et lappartement est pratique

Nice secure  apartment in a very central location  within walking distance of Ho-Ho bus   grocery stores  restaurants  shopping and many major tourist sites. Host is customer centric and very responsive to travelers needs.
Great host  great apartment in the most convenient location. Connell will make you feel at home.

Absolutely loved our stay at the Market House Was so close to literally everything and was a prime location for night life The room itself was so spacious and amazing. Would definitely stay there again when I come back
The place is really good  clean  near many places  great communication with the host
Such a friendly host  perfect location - we really enjoyed our stay
Connell Davids was really nice and we had a great stay I would do it again
Goed verblijf  zeker een aanrader
nice place in the middle of the green market Square and friendly host
Davids very nice and warm welcome. for this place near a lot of restaurants shopping area and easy to go landmark in Cape Town

Such a wonderful spot  nice and central with everything you need  and absolutely no load-shedding This was a gem of a find  making our stay that much easier. Cornell was a wonderful host  100 recommend this place to stay

Connell  with no risk of exaggeration  is the best and most professional Airbnb host I have had the pleasure to encounter. He is fantastic Helpful  responsive and going above and beyond to make their guests welcome and happy. Couldnt recommend him more with words. Just book it and experience yourself

Great location for visiting central attractions of the city. Connell  was a very attentive and informative host. Connell kindly picked us up from the airport for a very reasonable fee. Would highly recommend

Wirhaben alles so vorgefunden wie es beschrieben ist. Die Wohnung liegt ideal um alles fulufig  zu erreichen. Fr weitere Touren ist der Nahverkehr in kurzer Zeit zu erreichen. Groe Kche und Platz in der Dusche. Auch fr einen lngeren Aufenthalt in Kapstaft gut geeignet
Connell is a great host  prompt and friendly. The flat has all you need and overlooks a vibrant historic square . A great base to explore Cape Town.
Right in the middle of city center. Can see the market over the balcony. I kept getting hot at night since there is no AC and the fan was broken but other than that this place was good. Thank you
I had a great stay at Connells place. Location is perfect Walkable to many great sites and restaurants. Perfect view of the Market

O flat  localizado numa regio central  prximo de supermercado  restaurantes  ponto de nibus do citysightseeing hop on hop off  lojas em geral e de um belo parque  onde vc pode fazer caminhadas no fim da tarde. Devido  localizao central  existe o problema da insegurana  por isso evite andar sozinho tarde da noite. Porm  h policiais na rea. Tenha muito cuidado com os batedores de carteira. O flat  espaoso com cozinha bem equipada e tem pequena varanda  com vista para uma feira de artesanato. O quarto tem duas camas com colcho de mola  o que  um pouco desconfortavel para dormir. No h ventilao natural no quarto  nem ar condicionado  o que o torna muito quente durante o vero. H um ventilador no quarto  mas no  suficiente para diminuir o calor. O proprietrio  muito atencioso e atende s mensagens rapidamente. Ele me pegou no aeroporto  no dia da chegada e me levou de volta ao aeroporto  no dia da sada  com pontualidade. Portanto  recomendo o flat do Connell.
Cape Town merkezinde restoranlar cafe ve barlar yry mesafesinde kalabalk ve turistik bir meydan kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum 55..Connell  sper bir ev sahibi teekkrler dostum..

The appartment was nice and clean  just what we needed. I loved the location because it is central and there is a 24 hr security in the building. Right in front of the appartment was a very interesting market. Connell was so kind and responsive and always checked on us. Thanks again

Perfect place to stay for being in Cape Town CBD  if you want good value  simple accommodation to use as a base for being out and about each day  exploring everything that Cape Town and surrounds has to offer.  Greenmarket Square is a hive of activity  some good eateries within close walking distance  and Ubers in abundance mean a pick up is never more than 2-3 minutes away if you want to to further.
Great location  a bit noise from the road but overall good. A special thanks to the lovely cleaning lady Sariana. We miss you already
Best place to stay in Cape Town We would definitely come back to this wonderfull appartment in the nicest neighborhood of CT Don't hesitate and book this lovely place immediately  Enjoy

Best Airbnb place weve ever chosen Kats place has great location with shops and amazing cafe nearby. Apartment itself is very comfortable and spacious  perfect for a coupe or two  We would love to come back there in the future  Thank you Kat and Rita
Loved the apartment  very spacious and the garden room was wonderful great location.
Great location  Rita was representing Kate and she was there to meet us when we checked in  she was a wonderful host.

The apartment is beautiful. Its fully equipped  clean and the location is great.  I was planning to stay 7 weeks and Im sure I would have if there were better circumstances. The problem was that there is a big construction just next door really noisy. I booked it because of the garden to enjoy  but this was not possible. The biggest problem for me was the mice problem because of the construction. I bought a whole package of toast bread and in the morning there were only two slices left I didnt feel comfortable anymore. Like I said if this wouldnt have been  I would have stayed.
Wonderful home space full of character in the heart of the mother city. Highly recommended.
This apartment is as described in the presentation. 2 bedrooms and a kitchensitting area.

Our stay at Kat's apartment was lovely. The apartment is walking distance to restaurants and very close to the Waterfront. The only downside of our stay was that we had to wait 2.5 hours before we could go into the apartment  after a 15 hour drive  as we could not get hold of anyone to come and open for us. Kat was out of town and there was no number to contact Rita. The apartment was equipped with exactly what was needed.

We had a wonderful time and felt more than at home for the month of our stay. Especially the living room of the apartment is spacious and was our favourite place. At the moment there is a construction building next to the apartment  but this didn't bother us very much as we did a lot of outdoor activities anyway. The communication with Kat worked great - she is a wonderful person.  Also the cleaning lady Sariana is stunning. You will love them both.
Very central  neat and comfortable space. Kat is a great host.
Great host at a lovely venue. Location is perfect as a middle venue to explore Cape Town.
Kat is a very nice and friendly person. The flat is very stylish and perfect located. She took care about us and supported us if we needed something. She really cares. Thanks Kat for the great stay

Eugene and Daniele are the best hosts one may wish for. I had an incredible stay with them and will treasure my short stay with them forever. The accommodation is stylish  clean and very comfortable. The hosts went out of their way to make may stay a memorable one. I will definately return to this listing.

Thank you for the fantastic time in Cape Town. Kats apartment is perfectly located  pretty much between Green and Sea Point  with lots of Restaurants  Breakfast spots and bars just around the corner or a few minutes walk away. Her place has everything you would need  with a really cozy vibe and just felt like home for the days weve been in CP. Kat was super friendly and gave us lots of tips for things to see and do. Would always come back  so highly recommended

Kat's apartmentis quirky  clean  comfortable and oh so convenientfor anyone wantingto enjoy the Atlantic Seaboard. You can walk to wonderful   treat your tastebuds at delis and bakeries. We especially enjoyed walking just across the road to the entrance of the beautiful Green Point Park and out of the other entrance at the lighthouse and strolling along the Promenade.

Wonderful apt in a beautiful complex with lots of green and pleasant neighbors. The apt is - apart from a TV we would not have turned on anyways - fully equipped with everything you need for your stay in Capetown. There are restaurants and stores nearby and a beautiful and safe park just across the street. Parking was not a problem as well. Though we didnt meet Kat personally  she was very responsive on WhatsApp.

Great spot  very cozy. The neighbors in the building are quite nice. The space is quite lived in so it's easy to get comfortable. The fireplace is a huge boon during winter  especially considering the age of the building does translate to not so great insulation. We definitely enjoyed our stay there and would gladly go back again.
Cozy house and great location  within walking distance of the waterfront and many nice restaurants and cafes. Kat was a great host  very helpful and accommodating.

The accommodation is as pictured  with proactive instructions and plenty of recommendations  ensuring a fantastic and hassle-free stay in Cape Town The two unexpected elements for us two adults and two young kids were 1 the large garden not directly accessiblein sight from the apartment and 2 the reasonable noise from the road. However  despite these  I wholeheartedly recommend this centrally located accommodation. It offers a wonderful atmosphere that truly makes you feel at home  something that's quite rare on Airbnb.
Thank you so much for this wonderful time at this beautiful place.

Glenn and Marie were both excellent hosts and their groundskeeper  Solomon  was an awesome and helpful addition to the property. It's great people like them that made our stay in Camps Bay  Cape Town  that much greater. The bedrooms  living rooms  fully stocked kitchen and furnished villa are top notch and one of the best properties I have ever stayed in while on holiday. I highly recommend One On Houghton  in Camps Bay for any family or group of friends looking to stay in the area.

I had a great experience while staying at Beverly's lovely home. It was actually a privilege to get to know her. She is a very skilled  generous and considerate host. She certainly understand the needs of her guests. She and her husband  Alan are a very special team. The studio is in a beautiful garden setting  well equipped and very comfortable. I needed internet access for professional reasons  and it was such a  relief to find a fast and reliable connection.  I would certainly not hesitate to return to  or to recommend Beverly's place to anyone.
A lovely place  quiet and well-organized - we enjoyed our stay and would certainly recommend it
We enjoyed our stay so much The room was beautiful and comfortable  and Bev was a wonderful hostess.  Many thanks  Miki and Johan

The accommodation was exactly as expected and perfect for not only an overnight stay like we did  but also for a longer stay. The room is elegant and squeaky clean very comfortable bed and plenty on offer for the continental breakfast. Beverley is a gracious host and communication with her was speedy and easy. She very kindly dropped us at Newlands rugby stadium and it was a nice  vigorous walk back to their place afterwards. We will stay here again.

We stayed for two nights at the largo guesthouse where we enjoyded the most hospitable welcome. Beverley was very friendly And gave us Some Nice do's And don't 's for our visit to capetown. Very clean room with everything you need. We even had a private parking lot wich ment We didn't have to worry About leaving our rental car. Overall a very positive expierience
Lovely accommodation with great view  close to nature but also short way to city center. Beverly was a lovely host. Would definitely recommend to family  friends. Thank you

My friends and I 7 in total had a wonderful time. Location was just great with only a ten min walk to Camps Bay restaurants. The layout of the house is just perfect for up to five couples and it lends itself very well to entertaining. We had 40 over for a Braii one evening and it worked out really well. The pool is ok but like most in the area not for swimming in. Plenty of car parking spaces though we did not drive. Also very secure and in a great secure area. Wonderful caf at the end of the road for breakfast or lunch - really good. The house is perfectly wired for WIFI  music and TV and the kitchen is very well stocked. And then there is Solomon - a wonderful member of staff that just quietly goes about the house working away each day. We will definitely be back.

We had a fantastic stay at this house. We had 9 adults and the house worked beautifully. Before we got there  I was a little worried that Camps Bay was too far out of town for a tourist  but it wasn't an issue. Great local restaurants and easy and cheap taxi to VA waterfront and other sites. The hop on and hop off bus also has a stop within a 10 minute walk. Solomon was the perfect host too incredibly welcoming and nothing was too much trouble. Highly recommended.
Everything was amazing Highly recommend to stay here lovely location amazing villa. Solomon was a lovely surprise he was very welcoming and accommodating even did our BRAAI

Everything was fab - the house  view  location and Soloman We were a group of 6 and thoroughly enjoyed our time there....Glenn and Marie made us feel so welcome and the 2 bottles of wine  milk and water were very much appreciated Definitely recommend staying here

Our stay was absolutely incredible. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay there. There is nothing we would change about the house or our hosts. Solomon was such a pleasure to have around. His friendly nature and kindness was so welcoming. I highly recommend this villa to anyone looking for a special experience in Camps Bay.

What can I say... This place is incredible We had the best time ever staying at one houghton. Glenn was the best host ever and so helpful  Solomon who is onsite to help with anything you need really made our stay amazing. Thank you for everything

Stayed at this mansion of a villa prior to my wedding with a party of 10. Incredible experience  pictures are true to what you actually get  location is fantastic just steps away from a really good breakfast spot  private bathrooms for each room  top rooms have exquisite views of the ocean  everything is clean and in working order  laundry service  folding and ironing  and the best part is the super cute and friendly housekeeper who keeps the place immaculate. I can't say enough good things about this villa  just pack your bags and go Marie and Glenn are amazing as well and were accommodating in every way possible. Highly recommend this gem

We have celebrated our Wedding in Glenns House and we had a wonderful stay and unforgetable Wedding. The whole Family stayed with us in the House. It was the Perfect Location for the ceremony. Glenn always Supported us as much as he could  very fast answers in any case. Also the housekeeper Solomon was a big Support. He came every day and cleaned the whole House and helped us with any questions. We are very grateful for this fantastic stay
Great place  and great service by Glenn

15 of us stayed at Glenn's for a giant week-long sleepover in Cape Town and both the city and his home were stunning. We only would have liked clearer communication  for instance a book with emergency info and all-inclusive instructions on what we could and could not use or do within the house because we felt a little lost upon arrival. We also weren't aware that resident housekeeper meant that his male housekeeper was 100 live-in. As young girls who chose Airbnb in order to have a place with a little more privacy  we were weary about that  but all in all the housekeeping was a bonus and we appreciated the help.
Great house Pictures are accurate and location is very convenient. Would definitely recommend. Glenn is very responsive and Solomon housekeeper is very gracious.

Glenn's house is a very good option to stay in Cape Town. Only a few blocks from Camps Bay's beach and restaurants. The house is huge  very well equipped and and the permanent presence of Solomon  the housekeeper  makes it stay clean and tidy always.
The house was spacious and beautifully neat and clean.  Perfectly situated and Solomon kept everything organised and tidy.  He was great. We all had the best time together there.

I am always nervous booking online and whether the actual will live up to the photos and description - we were not disappointed in this case The place is amazing  and so close to the beachshopsrestaurants of Camps Bay - we could safely walk there  The hosts were very helpful in their communications leading up to our visit  and the place itself is beautiful.  Highly recommend you definitely stay here
Great location - about 15 minutes walk from Camps Bay. Disappointing that the trees in Glen's yard are blocking the view from the living area.
Fantastic house  great location  and easy communication with the host. The house manager Solomon is a legend
A great central location to Camps Bay.  Rooms were adequate.  Spaces are comfortable.  Extra touches with flowers  fruits etc were appreciated

Glenn's place was perfect for our trip to Cape Town as a family. The location is amazing  a very easy 10 minute walk to Camps Bay's restaurants and beaches and a nice coffee shop right by the house. The views from the top balcony and main bedroom are stunning over Lion's Head and although the trees shade the views some around the pool  it makes the place feel very private. The common spaces were great  the pool is very small and was very cold so definitely just a plunge pool  but we didn't use it too much as we were out exploring. Solomon the housekeeper was very nice and considerate  helping to keep the house tidy every day  although I would say it made it slightly difficult to relax when I was up early with our little boy and it might be nice to discuss the preferredshortened hours of help ahead of the stay. However  we were very grateful all the same. The place was immaculate  very stylish and beautifully decorated. We'd come back again in a heartbeat  thank you

Die Unterkunft war einfach nur perfekt. Schn und ruhig gelegen im schnen Newlands. Mit Bev und Allan zwei sympatische  offene und beraus gastfreundlichen Vermietern. Es waren gute Dokumentation in der Unterkunft vorhanden  welche es einem sehr leicht machten  sich in der nheren Umgebung des Quartiers zurerchtzufinden. Seien es Restauranttipps  Ausflugsideen und sogar zwei Joggingrunden. Kann Bev und Allan mit absolut guten Gewissen weiterempfehlen Unmglich  sich an 9  Largo Road nicht wohlzufhlen.
Just as advertised
What a great stay
Beautiful views  amazing bedrooms. The perfect place to rent out with family or a group of friends.
We had a wonderful stay at this property I highly recommend it.
Fantastic home. Would stay again
Incredible stay
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Breath taking views and nice and spacious rooms. Kitchen is well equipped and Solomon on the premises very helpful and friendly
Great service and a great stay
This is a very beautiful house  with an amazing view. We would love to come back.

The place was absolutely beautiful.  Plenty of room for all of my family plus our own bathrooms.  The patios were wonderful.  However feeling safe in a place you are staying is worth everything.  Our third night there  somebody came into 3 of our rooms and stole all of the Ranz we had plus some items.  The windows appeared locked but were easily opened.  I tried to contact the host but he didnt respond.  The police came and were most suspicious of the housekeeper who lived on property.  The alarm system had gone off and the housekeeper called the security team off telling them we must have just got back from dinner.  No other properties were available so we had to stay the remaining 3 night is that house.  I was scared to let my teenage daughter sleep alone so she slept in my room the rest of the trip.  One positive is that once the host did respond he provided security in the evening.  Solomon  the housekeeper  remained in his quarters.  Please be cautious if you are staying here.
The house is spectacular  beautifully designed with incredible views over the ocean. Solomon the housekeeper took great care of us and was on hand in case we needed anything.
Wonderful place  close to activities. Could have used a heater  but overall great
A well designed place  very recommended
Absolutely wonderful stay. The place was lovely and Solomon was very helpful with any additional needs we had. Great views and extremely spacious. All amenities as described in ad
Great  Great  Great property. Location  design   amenities  layout  views... all excellent. To top it up  the housekeeper  Solomon was great and very helpful throughout our stay.
Beautiful place and wonderful views. Soloman the house keeper was so helpful and Glenn was really accomodating with an early check in time- we would highly recommend.
Awesome house in great neighborhood
Great place in a good location. Stayed with a group of friends and was perfect

Katja is such a sweetheart She made us feel welcome as soon as we arrived. We enjoyed our stay in a secure  clean environment with a beautiful view. The apartment exceeded our expectations. I would recommend it to anyone looking for comfort on a budget.
Very nice apartment. did not meet Katja but here husband Wolfgang. Clean and a safe place. Amazing view.
Schnes Apartment  gnstige Lage zur Stadt  Einkaufsmglichkeiten in unmittelbarer Nhe. Katja und Wolfgang sind gute und hilfsbereite Gastgeber.
Enjoyed the stay and appreciated the constant communication. Will definitely recommend.
Had a good stay at Katja's Airbnb. Beautiful views and looks exactly like the posted pictures. Kathy was always available when needed and checked up on us during the stay. Highly recommended

I found the house welcoming and katia very helpful  close to the supermarket and bus stop  the only flaw was that they cut off the power continuously every day and walking six floors was very uncomfortable
Katja can come off a bit rude. She was also slow to respond and didnt really try to sort out our situation
Extremely professional  friendly  warm  responsive and an absolutely fantastic host. That about sums up my experience with Katja. One can expect nothing but the best.

This has been my home for the past two months and I really enjoyed my stay. Centrally located with all amenities close by. Apartment is fully kitted out and all I needed was the clothes on my back and my phone to take pics of the beautiful view and the sunset right outside my bedroom window. Thank you Katja  I will never forget this experience.
Very friendly and helpful. Great apartment with stunning view on table mountain - just perfect

We enjoyed our stay at this apartment. Awesome location. Very central. Quiet and relaxing  neighbourhood. Apartmemt has everything you need and homely feel to it. Modern and secure apartment. Host is friendly and extremely easy going. Very helpful. I rate this a 5star stay.
Gus was a great host and always available when needed. This apartment is in a great central location with stunning mountain views.
An incredible apartment with a Fantastic host.
Gus is the perfect host and his place is really ideal and centrally located. Good value for money

Fantastic spot in potentially the best neighborhood in Cape Town It is in a safe and quiet area  but within walking distance from a range of cafes  restaurants  and bars. Great host  view  and living space. Would highly recommend to anyone looking to stay in Cape Town
The house is very close to the city  just a short walk from Longstreet etc. Everything was clean and Gideon is really nice

Lovely leafy neighbourhood and close to all amenities. Very tastefully appointed room with King-size bed ample space for 2 people. Beverley was extremely welcoming and helpful with everything. We had a wonderful 2 nights and couldn't have asked for a better start to our Cape Town holiday

Beverley is a lovely host and has created a beautiful space to stay. So many thoughtful details like breakfast items and extras that make it all the more comfortable. Would love to go back Great area - safe and quiet  but nearby to Cavendish Square and easy to get to other parts of the Cape Town area.

La camera  composta da zona notte  bagno e zona cucina   confortevole  arredata con gusto e luminosa. Si trova in una zona tranquilla di Cape Town  silenziosa e sicura  ai piedi dei Kirstenbosch Gardens  adatta a chi pu spostarsi in auto. Beverly  un'ospite attenta a rendere il soggiorno piacevole e confortevole sotto tutti i punti di vista.

We loved our stay at Largo. The suite was wonderfully decorated and with attention for the little details  like fresh fruit  delicious muffins if they are homemade  I would love to have the recipe  yoghurt etc. on arrival  a extensive infomap etc. Bev is very welcoming  with useful tips but not intrusive. Plenty of towels and linen  great bed and shower. Would definitely stay again if I'd come back to Cape Town.

The room was stunning  and much more than I expected. Situated on the bank of the Liesbeek River  at the foot of Table Mountain  this guest house is in one of the most scenic suburbs of Cape Town. Bev was very friendly  welcoming  and eager to tell me all about the area. I wouldn't hesitate to book this one again in future  and can honestly recommend it to anyone.

Beverly was a wonderful hostess and the room was absolutely lovely. What really sets it apart is the attention to detail - from hot water bottles to a lovely breakfast  Bev provided everything a visitor could possible want.  Highly recommended

We loved the little personal touches in our room such as the fresh flower  delicious baked goodies  fresh fruit and chocolates. It made us feel quite pampered and spoiled. The location was perfect for us and we would definitely use Beverley again.
The host was charming and welcoming. Sh mde very effort to make my stay as comfortable as possible and offered me the superior room after one day's stay.

I have immensely enjoyed my time at Largo House and with Beverley. The neighbourhood is peaceful and beautiful  and the room was clean and well-maintainedprepared. The attentiveness and care and recommendationssuggestions I received from Beverley and her family I would only receive from a friend or family. Beverley had kindly invited me to hikes  drives and coffee. She is very good with people and has a natural talent of knowing how close to get to them. I highly recommend booking with Beverley  and I would definitely book again at her's if I am to come back to Newlands.

I fully enjoyed my stay in Beverleys lovely BnB It was one of the best bnb experiences that I have ever had. The room is very nicely furnished and everything is clean  practical and well thought out with lovely views of the mountains from the window. It is walking distance to Claremont  and from there Cape Town city center is very accessible. Beverley was a thoughtful and accommodating host  and I will certainly stay here again if I return to Cape Town.

My stay at Largo House was so good I decided to stay longer  Beverley is a wonderful host who provides nice little personal touches. She is knowledgeable about the surrounding environs and city.    She provided great tips on places to visit and things to do  and not  to do .   Provided lots of great brochures and booklets about Cape Town and things happening in town.  Her booklet  that orients you to the property and surrounding environment is great. Lots of maps and mini reviews for shops and restaurants.  She even helped me get a cab when my alternative taxi app failed to work The room is as pictured and promised  with great views and a beautiful surrounding environment. Close to shopping  restaurants  public transport and everything you need but in a real neighborhood that is beautiful and close to all sorts of outdoor activities.
Great view. Large well decorated room. Best bed we slept in during our travel in south Africa. Nice terrace where we had breakfast every morning with view on the table mountain.
It was a brief stay but we were left with good impressions all round. The hosts made contact before the time the welcoming was superb. The place is well maintained and very close to public places.

Really welcomed to a very beautiful home in a great location for first timers in Cape Town. Room was lovely and we really loved the freshly baked  muffins. Two lovely dogs in a beautiful home. Definitely would come back to stay in the future.

Beverley was lovely and welcoming and her beautiful guest suite was clean and cosy. The location so close to Newlands was also perfect for our last night in Cape Town watching the cricket. I'm only sorry that our tight schedule and early flight meant that we were unable to enjoy it more

Beverley was an engaged and welcoming host.  The room was everything I expected from the post  and more.  It is beautifully laid out  comfortable and well equipped.  It is also perfectly situated with convenient access to the city as well as Cape Towns best scenic spots.  I will definitely use Bev's rooms for overnight business trips again.

My three nights stay with Beverley at Largo House was extremely pleasant. It was my first Airbnb experience and I look forward making use of this friendly and clean setup on my next trip to Cape Town. My room was big and quiet in this beautiful suburb of the mother city. The separate entrance to the property and then to the room made it very private  as there was no disturbance and interference for either one of us.  Bath towels  TV and small breakfast was provided in the room. I can highly recommend staying with Beverley  great value for money

Dear Beverley  thank you for your warm hospitality and a comfortable  relaxing nights' rest at your home-from-home accommodation.  Everything was just great  I will definitely book in at Largo House on my next trip.

I enjoyed my stay at Largo House immensely.  Wish I could have stayed for more nights - it was just like home-from-home.  Most comfortable room and all the amenities conveniently provided.  Largo House is my first choice of accommodation in Cape Town

Beverley was a great host. She assisted me when I arrived in the pouring rain  made special arrangements with the breakfast supplies to comply with my food allergies  and was friendly and helpful throughout my stay. The accommodation was comfortable  clean and lived up to expectations. Secure parking is provided. The location is great  in a quiet spot right next to the Liesbeek River  with several restaurants and Cavendish Square within walking distance. I would definitely stay there again.
The host was around sometimes and would ask if i needed anything. Rooms were also cleaned regularly. Overall a nice stay.

We had a super time. Bev was a kind and generous host. The room was beautiful. Quiet neighbourhood close to SACS High School shops restaurants etc. Just great. Until next year. Thanks Bev. Regsrds David and Enza Manley

This was my second visit to Largo House  and Beverley was once again the perfect hostess. The location is central  in a quiet spot in Newlands with access by foot to the commercial hub of Claremont. I highly recommend this listing.
Bev was extremely welcoming  and a lovely home and location.
Beverley is an excellent host. We discussed many things in common and she gave me great ideas for things to do and see in Cape Town. She also made sure that I got my Uber lift to the airport.
I felt secure and well cared for during my stay.  The suite has a fridge and food counter where Beverley provides different breakfast items each day.  Everything was well appointed and comfortable.
Great location  Bev is a wonderful host.

Beverley and Alan are great hosts offering you support or privacy as much as you want. My roomsuite was beautiful with good provisions for breakfast. Ideal if you have a car but taxis are also easy to get. Couldn't praise this place enough.

The room Beverly offeres is nice and cosy en perfectly clean.   Its somwhat  away from Capetown in a lovly green environment.   Perfect place to stay to discover Capetown and the environment.  Beverly can tell you all about the nice places to go.

The room has a small outside seating area. Good facilities  secure parking  safe riverside walk and walking distance to shops and pubeateries not to mention popping in to the Vineyard Hotel for an evening drink or bar meal. Altogether  a really enjoyable stay. We hope to return at some point.

If staying in Cape Town this is the place to stay. Beverley was a wonderful host going that extra mile to make my stay   as enjoyable as possible  even driving me around and sharing her knowledge of the city.  The room was spacious with everything  I needed and a great comphy bed.  Would totaly recommend staying here.
Great room. Private entrance and safe secure parking. Friendly hostess.
Very atrractive  comfortable  clean and quiet and a friendly host. What more could one want
What a lovely place to stay.  Beverly was the perfect host and I would recommend this accommodation to any traveller that wants to stay in a quiet neighbourhood with easy access to the city.
Easy access to the sites in Cape Town  comfortable and friendly couple. A very pleasurable stay. Highly recommended.

Beverly was a great host. Very accomodating and easy going. The room was great as well and the food and drinks in the room were always topped up for me when I ran low. A perfect place to stay for a get away.
This accommodation was just perfect and the location central and stunning. Thank you.
Thank you for a lovely homely welcome and stay. We enjoyed the beautiful room and the view was spectacular.

Beverly's place was clean and well located in a leafy part of Claremont. She is a kind host and a great communicator  who leaves extra touches like rusks and muffins to the room to make your stay more pleasant. Recommended
My husband stayed with Beverley. He said the accommodation was modern  clean and very well situated. He will definitely recommend it and stay again.
Recommended...
Excellent host  prime position. A great stay
Absolutely fabulous stay  ... All needs met with genuine care .... A beautiful home ... better than home from home ...
A lovely place to stay
Excellent.
Its a lovely place in a good neighborhood with great access to shopping mall and restaurants. And you basically have a great view to the table mountain. You will enjoy your stay
Lovely room  felt very at home. Will definitely stay again.

Your privacy and comfort is assured at Largo House. Fabulous help yourself health breakfast and tea-time treats. Position could not be better. Beautiful Table Mountain view from the sunny Bay Window and lovely forest walks on your doorstep. 5 star restaurants a hop and a skip away.  I can highly recommend Largo House and would stay there again.

The room is spacious  clean and comfortable We loved the views the room had to offer and how safe we felt The pool was for guest use too and beautifully warm  Bev and her husband were great hosts  who gave us our space but were also very very welcoming and helpful when we needed it.   The location of the house is perfect for anyone wanting to relax or travel around cpt  as it felt quite central to anywhere. Would have loved to have stayed here longer  somewhere we would defintely stay again without question
Excellent value for money  lovely surroundings  perfect hosts.

Cant fault this lovely place for anything. The perfect nest to rest and recharge before setting out on the days activities. Great area  lots to do around and close to Kirstenbosch gardens which was our No 1 place to go. Our daily muffins and rusks made our morning coffee in bed a pure treat.
Beautiful cottage and great hospitality. We loved our stay and would definitely recommend it.

Beautiful and serene room  with a large and very comfortable bed   breakfast supplied every day  in lovely surroundings and the most hospitable  helpful and friendly hosts - time went too far too quickly
Not recommended for anyone needing a dark room to sleep.
Lovely place to stay in Newlands.

This place was the best Airbnb I have stayed in by far. Check in  communication was fantastic. Place was exactly as described on Airbnb. Area is fantastic right next to vineyard hotel within walking distance to cavendish. Nice quiet road with beautiful views of the mountain. Beverly is a wonderful host. She kept on restocking our fridge  muffins  coffee etc. the bed was so comfortable and the linen and towels clean and better than 5 star hotel. I would return again soon and highly recommend this place. Cant fault it for anything.
Fabulous space. Perfect if you have a few days work in Cape Town. Lovely view of mountains  everything you need. Easy to walk around  safe. Makes traveling for work a pleasure.
Spacious room  high quality finishes  good amenities  very good location . Safe and very comfortable
We had a great stay at Largo House. Would definitely stay there again Lovely extras like Rusks  fruit and crumpets. Location is perfect
Bev and Alan are wonderful hosts. The room is extremely homey and the location is perfect for anybody wanting to go to the CBD or visit the Southern suburbs. I highly recommend their place

I can highly recommend Beverley's guest suite. I was attending a conference at the Vineyard hotel and I was  much happier with my room than a hotel room. The room was comfortable  spacious and stylish in beautiful Newlands. I appreciated the breakfast supplies and fruit and Beverley was the perfect host.
Spotless  comfortable and perfectly located thank you
Stylish  quiet and relaxed stay in beautiful Newlands.

Beverley and her husband went out of their way to make my stay one of the best ever  from start to finish  including helping me getting safely from the airport to their property. They were very nice  friendly and helpful at all times. The room and amenities were better than expected. Stylish  perfectly clean place amazing bed kitchenette with all first necessity products tea  sugar  ... even fresh fruits and milk in the fridge amazing view from the front window. I did not use the swimming pool but I know it is possible. It is also very practical to come and go independently. Really a much recommended place and host
The accommodation is fresh and lovely and the location outstanding - so central for Cape Town and easy access. We will definitely come back.

Absolutely lovely From the host to the room and location. Check in was seamless. Communication before and during my stay was amazing. My booking was very last minute and she did her best to accomodate me and ensure everything was ready for my arrival. The room is very clean  comfortable and quite spacious. Location is superb.

We enjoyed a very comfortable  peaceful stay. The bed is very comfortable and large.  Beverly has thought of all the necessities as well as comforts. Cereals  yogurt  fruit  milk  muffins  tea and coffee for breakfast were much appreciated.
Nice  quiet place. Very hospitable hosts. Short walking distance to shopping malls
Lovely place to stay  great hosts
Lovely  comfortable  and spacious room with mountain views out the window
Beverleys place is very convenient  clean and comfortable.
Fab  quiet and two fluffy friendly dogs

It was great to stay in Gideon's flat Central and safe area in traditional Muslim Bokaap  the room is nice  the flat is beautiful and clean and Gideon is a fantastic host  very reliable  considerate and helpful - I will miss his Bach piano exercise  Would definitely stay there again
Gideon was a wonderful host He made sure I arrived well and received the key  gave me advice about local shops and restaurants and provided a very welcoming home and room. I'll come back

We thoroughly enjoyed every moment of our stay. Beverley was a host par excellence. She was so accommodating and thoughtful. The Room was light and airy  full of beautiful touches that made our stay extra special.
Great place
My favorite Airbnb in Cape Town
Great place to stay... central  clean  stylish and safe for a lady alone. My second time I stayed here... will be back again... and again.

My stay at Largo was smooth  comfortable and without any hitches and the hosts are friendly people who communicated promptly. I can recommend them to anyone who's looking for a nice  private location in the Cape Town southern suburbs.

Largo house is the perfect oasis for anyone looking to get away from the hustle and bustle. Situated in the heart of Newlands it boasts access to not only tranquil parks  forests and trails but also quick road links to all parts of Cape Town via the M3. Beverley and Alan are fantastic hosts  affording a good balance of hospitality and privacy. The facilities are perfect for the needs of any self-catering professional looking to escape lockdown and work remotely. I highly recommend this lovely spot
I enjoyed my stay here
Largo House is perfectly situated with easy access to Newlands  Cavendish  the motorway  UCT  the Baxter  Groote Schuur  the golf courses  plus many more

Highly recommend this place. Very clean with extra touches that made the trip so much for comfortable. Parking on the premises and easy access to the main road. Just 20 minutes to the city. Would definitely stay here again.
Such a clean and inviting space. Super centrally located
Beverley is a fabulous host  the place was gorgeous and spotless and she makes you feel really welcome and at home
Gorgeously quiet yet central location. Clean  tidy  elegantly finished and lots of special touches which made it a pleasure to be there.

Bev is a super host in the original sense of the word - before Airbnb made it a thing. She is generous and caring  making you feel totally at home without making a big fuss. The location is perfect and close to shops and restaurants and Newlands forest.the room had everything I needed.
Beverley's cottages are perfect. They are extremely comfortable  beautifully furnished  reasonably priced with a magnificent view in a great location. I couldn't have asked for more. Thank you.
Incredible space to be in and an even better host whose heart shines through her ability to just make you feel as though you are at home. Thank you Beverley.
Lovely stay and lovely accommodation
fabulous
Exceptional Airbnb... stylishly furnished  luxurious  centrally located  everything you need so well thought out. Bev is a fantastic host... loved staying there.
Really enjoyed my second stay at Largo House - Bev is a wonderful host  the place is stunning and in a great area
top class hospitality   home away from home   enjoyed very minute of my stay
Great hosts  great location  great space Highly recommend if youre considering coming to stay here

I could not fault my stay at Bev and Allan's beautiful home.  The cottage is stunning.  The bed is incredibly comfortable and decked out with 5 star hotel bed sheets.  It's in a great location and I felt extremely safe.  The best part was making friends with Bev and Allan.  Bev even took me for a tour on my last day and took me out for breakfast.  I definitely recommend staying here.
This was my second time staying here. Lovely little place thats so much better than expected. Highly recommend
A great stay and fantastic location.

Beverley's very comfortable accommodation is highly recommended.  The description of the facility and what was available  as given on the web site  was spot on.  I will certainly stay again  if the occasion arises.

Amazing host. Bev is accommodating and personable. She is also very helpful. Room was quaint  neat and warm. A hone away from home. The views outside the room of Table Mountain and Devil's Peak are gorgeous. Well situated to popular spots in Newlands too. Definitely would come back here

I had a very easy and comfortable stay at Largo House  The bed was really comfortable and I had everything that I needed  A bowl of fruit and a bottle of milk in the fridge were the nicest touches - simple  but greatly appreciated  I can highly recommend Largo House for a convenient location and accommodating and thoughtful hosts
Beautiful room. Beverley was super helpful and polite. Very thoughtful touches to the space . Everything was clean and very comfortable. Will definitely stay again

Beverly definately deserves her superhost status. Everything was clean and beautifully decorated. I had informed her that we're vegan and without hesitation she had ensured to amend things catering to our needs. For sure a great place to stay. We had even received a parting gift from our sweet host and her fluffy little cutie.

We had a lovely stay at Beverlys place From the window of the room you have a beautiful view on Table Mountain. Beverly recommend some hike trails and we had a beautiful day up in the mountains. The house is located close to supermarkets  nice coffee places on the corner of the street and restaurants. You can have a good nights rest here and recharge
Not hospitable. Racially profiling and unwelcoming
Very comfortable and convenient place to stay  everything catered for.
Fantastic experience Hassle free  lots of nice thoughtful touches and service.  Beautiful  safe and convenient. Very spacious room with good amenities and reliable wifi
Was very grateful to have a good place to stay. Nice area for walking

I had a great time at Largo House guest suite. The communication was super easy and quick and the place looks exactly like it does on the pictures. Beverly is a great host  she made sure I got everything I needed. The neighborhood is very conveniently located  it's surrounded by a lot of trees and is very quiet Would absolutely recommend to stay there

We had a lovely stay here. The room is extremely clean and neat The bed is really comfortable and the room has everything you need. The wifi was also very good. Beverley gave us good tips about our hike up table mountain. I would definitely recommend this place

I was here for work and sadly  didnt spend too much time on the property but this was the perfect homely and comfortable place to stay I enjoyed the small touches like having breakfast goodies I could quickly grab in the mornings on my way to work. Wi-Fi works well except of course when the unexpected power outage happens. Bev communicated well and timeously and provided light in the interim. The issue was quickly resolved. The room was exceptionally clean and well appointed and the area is really peaceful. Value for money listing. I would recommended

Largo House is a very comfortable and well located Air BnB. Beverley is definately a super host and everything in the room was well thought out.  What a great find a stone's throw away from the Vineyard Hotel. As a tourist guide  I could kot have wished for a better location. The room had everything that one could possibly need. Thanks again Beverley for being so hospitable. I will definately be back.

We really enjoyed our stay with Beverley and Alan  as well as their doggie Roxy. They are super friendly  helpful  and accommodating. The place was clean  tastefully decorated  and had all that you would need or expect. Bev was great about giving you some nice things for breakfast and replenishing things when we ran out. Theres a nice little park across the street where you can take a scenic walk. Its also a nice neighborhood in a great location in the NewlandsClaremont suburbs of Cape Town. We will definitely try to book this place again for any future trips

A very quiet place.  Felt like a home away from home. Bev is a very caring host. And I am terrified of dogs but their dog is so sweet. First dog I met that I have ever liked. It's a great place and there is a beautiful park across the road.
Beverley is an amazing host. She has a lovely space that is well decorated and she's added some nice thoughtful touches. Very good value for money. I would definitely recommend it
Beverly's place is at a perfect location  very close to restaurants as well as nature. Her place is great  very clean and has everything you need.

Bev and her husband are such amazing hosts. The accommodation was just what I needed She had so many thoughtful touches. I would definitely recommend a stay here 3  They are thoughtful and compassionate hosts. I'd definitely come back
Great location  especially for someone working remotely. The hosts are also very friendly.
Great host  great location

Probably the best place to stay at when you want to discover Cape Town. Plus the unique Haas as an every-morning source of coffee  well-tasting calories and inspiration. Gideon is a wonderful host  had many helpful tips for us and gave us an amazing start into our SA vacation.

Gideon is a sympatric laid back host and his house is great  both interior as also location wise. Close to the Waterkant best place to live in CT en only a few hundred meters from the CBD and nice places like Alexander Bar Bar and theatre This house also had a nice living room and a court yard and a stoep outside terrace along the street. In all  a fantastic place and I hope to visit it again.

The house is very comfortable and pleasant  in an interesting neighborhood   walking distance to many attractions.  Fantastic coffee shop on the corner--I had breakfast there every day.  Gideon was away during my stay  but his friend Fundiswa was there to transfer the key and she made me very welcome.  I would definitely recommend staying here for your trip to Cape Town.

Gideon was not available when I visited Cape Town however he made necessary arrangements so I could pick up keys from the neighbor. The neighborhood especially was amazing  the people were friendly and it is very centrally located and convenient to visit places from there.
Gideon house is really nice  clean spacious  and the area is very convenient. I will recommend it 100.

I very much enjoyed my stay at Gideon's place. The place is not too spacious  but I didn't mind that  since the interior design  furniture is very nice and the place has a great feel to it. Internet is fast in living room  kitchen available but slow in the guest room. Loved the bathroom. It's also very clean. Neighborhood is interesting Bree Street restaurants  Long Street bars  and Spar Market in Waterkant mall are all in 10 min walking distance. VA Waterfront is maybe 30 min walk  which I didn't mind given CT's spectacular views. Gideon was out a lot  but still accessible home on most evenings  on What's App. I had a conference so couldn't socialize too much but would have liked to hang out more. I broke a special wine glass when I had a visitor and felt terrible  but Gideon was very understanding. Sorry for drinking so much of the delicious Nespresso -

Gideon was really nice and did all he could to make my stay pleasant. The house is in an excellent location for exploring the Bo-Kaap Cape Malay neighborhood  down-town area and probably the best bar-streets in Cape Town. And it's a safe area.

A very nice house in a colorful special district very central located and a wonderful host I enjoyed more than two weeks at Gideons's house. The place is super comfortable  clean and safe. Gideon is an easy going very friendly guy. He cared even if we did not  see us very often through his job. I can highly recommend his house and I would like to come back. Servus Gideon

I didn't get to see Gideon much because we where in different schedules but Gideon was an Excellent host and gave me good food recommendations. The neighborhood was a perfect location to explore the city and the many museums. Also amazing coffee shops and wine bars nearby. Great location in a great city

Gideon was a very nice and helpful host  we felt very comfortable at his place. He was very responsive to any inquiries I had. The flat is very nice  furnished with good taste  neat and cosy  has an excellent location close to the city center and busy streets but is in a quiet neighborhood. The guest room is simple and clean  and comes with access to shared bathroom with superb bath tub  and a beautiful spacious  well equipped kitchen. Coffee in the morning in front of the house observing passers by was a pleasant start for any day. We had a car  and it was parked in front of the house on the street with no problems  of course one should be careful. The neighbors were really friendly and the location is perfect to see more of the special Cape Town quarter. Thank you Gideon for a nice stay in Bo Kaap
The most central  beautiful location. I felt 100 safe and Bev is just the most approachable  helpful host. Couldnt rate this spot for nature lovers  food lovers  and peace lovers more highly
Beverely is an amazing host. I can definitely recommend her

Great easy stay for our quick visit to Cape town. centrally located  friendly and prompt host  quiet area for a great nights rest. Thank you for the special touches you added to make the stay more comfortable  we can definitely recommend your place to others.
Great location. Welcoming hosts who provide a clean and very comfortable stay. Highly recommend.
Everything you need  and lovely little extra touches to make you comfortable.
An amazing stay with amazing hosts Definitely recommended.
This is a real five star find.  Spacious  super comfortable cottage that is generously stocked with edibles etc.  great location in Newlands.  Couldnt ask for a better
Great location  clean rooms  excellent recommendations  great welcome package of yoghurts and fruits. Beverley made us feel right at home.
Great value for money  lovely location  clean and really friendly host Will definitely be back

Beverley was a lovely host and always available whenever needed.  Her place is beautiful and has all the extra touches that makes it comfy and homely.  Loved all the snacks that she presented with a fine eye.  I will definitely be back.
5 stars for everything location  access to transport routes  service  hospitality  secure parking and a gorgeous room. I will definitely return. One of the best AirBnBs I have been to.
Such a lovely stay with real attention to detail. Nice little extras that made the stay really specialcomfortable. Beverley is a great host
Amazing place to stay and you wont get better value for money
A wonderful place to stay. Everything you need is provided - plus a bit more. Beverly is an excellent host and went out of her way to provide a vegan snack for me. Ill be back
This cottage was perfect. Great views  cosy  warm  private. Beverly is a fantastic host. Ill definitely be back here .
Absolutely wonderful stay
A lovely place with great views. I enjoyed the nice extra touches from the hosts I'll definitely recommend
This is the best AirBnB I have ever stayed in. Book it if you can. You will not be disappointed.

Beverley and Alan were amazing hosts. Unfortunately  we got sick for two days  but they looked after us and brought us soup and medicine. The room was cleaned regularly and the area is nice and relatively safe. I would recommend this accommodation to anyone who needs a quiet room while staying in Cape Town.
Spacious bedroom and comfy bed  beautifully furnished with a privileged view  would definitely recommend staying at Beverleys
What an amazing place with amazing hosts. I keep on returning and never disappointed. Thank you Bev for always going the extra mile to make my stay special. See you soon

Wonderful stay at Beverley's Highly recommend. The space is clean and inviting. It is in a great location in the southern suburbs with accessible Uber and restaurants. Beverley is a lovely thoughtful host and is very welcoming.
Great  convenient place to stay - very comfortable  easy access
Bev is a fantastic host we were truly comfortable in her lovely home

Booked for a colleague who shared the following review - My stay was fabulous  and everything I needed was catered for. The home was well positioned and in close traveling distance to everywhere I needed to go. I would highly recommend this as a place to stay in the lovely leafy suburb of Claremont.

Beverley was a fantastic host. We could not have asked for a more pleasant stay. The guest suite was spotless  comfortable and had everything we required for our 2 week stay. The location is great and is walking distance to great restaurants and shops. The neighbourhood is leafy and quiet. Thanks again for the lovely stay.
Great stay with a great host

Heerlijk verblijf in Newlands. Op loopafstand van diverse restaurants en Cavendish mall. Mooi groene omgeving. 5 min lopen naar Vinyard hotel voor ontbijt of iets te eten. Heel centraal in Kaapstad  maar toch rustig. Kamer is ruim en schoon. Heerlijk zwembad om even af te koelen. Beverley is makkelijk en prettig met communiceren. Aanrader
Great host. Really enjoyed our stay  would definitely book again.
A super little spot with a grand view of the mountain to enjoy while having breakfast. Bev was a wonderful host and helped the many little touches made it an enjoyable stay

I had booked the accommodation for my dad for two nights. He enjoyed his stay with a peaceful room that was super neat and clean. The host Beverley was very welcoming and accommodating  will definitely be staying Largo house again

We had a very comfortable stay - home away from home Relaxed  attentive  friendly hosts. Our spot at Largo House was safe  quiet  very well appointed and private. We enjoyed the fresh fruit  milk  flapjacks and rusks that Bev had put in the kitchen area. We couldnt fault it in any way  and we'll definitely be back.

Bevs place is a gem in such beautiful surroundings. Its immaculate  clean and comfortable. Plush bedding and toiletries. Lovely touches with a daily muffin and muesli and yoghurt. Real treat. Bev is a wonderful host. Would definitely recommend it and will definitely be back.

I hate travelling alone and I am always so jittery when doing so. But at Beverly's place I felt right at home. I felt safe and secure. The place is amazing  the host is attentive and friendly. I will definitely be coming back

Beverley is a 5 star host Communication is on point and friendly throughout the stay The place is immaculately clean  as advertised and attention to detail is so appreciated. The yogurt  fruit and muffins were a small touch that goes along way A few items of laundry were washed out of kindness. Close walking distance to all shops  restaurants and coffee places was ideal Beautiful stream walk underneath the trees across the road. Highly recommend  thank you Beverley
Perfect stay in CT.
It was an amazing place to stay in
Large open room in brilliant location - close to shops and malls. Beverley was kind enough to leave some breakfast items as well as coffeetea. Great two nights.

Bev was very accommodating and she pays so much attention to detail. I especially enjoyed the extra  thoughtful muffins  rusks and yoghurt.  Loved the bed A very quiet and peaceful home away from home.

Our stay at Gideon's place was enjoyable. We've been to Cape Town quite a few times but it was awesome being minutes away from the city centre. I didn't get to see Gideon much  but he was very helpful and responsive to the queries we had. Thumbs up
Lovely stay in beautiful surroundings. Lovely clean  comfortable room. Loved the muffins  rusks  yoghurt and muesli. Bev is the best host. So kind and helpful.
Thank you Beverley  my colleague Phillip says it was very nice and perfect for him
doesnt have a kitchen so had to use bathroom water to make tea or coffee
Thanks Beverly  my stay was very comfortable and was such great value for money. Nice touches like the breakfast goodies and electric blanket were very much appreciated. Highly recommended to anyone.
Delightful spot to stay  beautiful setting  tastefully appointed  charming hostess  every comfort taken possible  a wonderful stay Highly recommended
Great place. Very affable and kind people. Great location.
Beautiful and cozy place to stay and a short walk from the nice Newlands area with restaurants. Host was very helpful  responsive and friendly. Would recommend staying here
My employee really enjoyed her stay. Very convenient location and our business will definitely use your lovely cottage again.
Beverleys place was perfect  close to restaurants and coffee shops. The little extras like rusks  muffins etc were so thoughtful. I highly recommend.
Location and amenities were superb. would definitely book again.

Beautiful surroundings  quiet  peaceful. Largo house is a wonderful place to stay. Clean  tidy with lovely touches of quality shampoo  hand  body wash etc. The muffins  fresh fruit  muesli  yogurt  rusks etc. which were available for breakfast was appreciated  especially the variety on different days.
